  243: 
  244: all() ->
  245:     [
  246:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  247:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  248:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  249:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  250:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  251:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
  252:     ] ++ simple_api_tests().
  253: 
  254: groups() ->
  255:     [
  256:      {'tlsv1.3', [], ((gen_api_tests() ++ tls13_group() ++
  257:                            handshake_paus_tests()) --
  258:                           [dh_params,
  259:                            new_options_in_handshake,
  260:                            handshake_continue_tls13_client])
  261:       ++ (since_1_2() -- [conf_signature_algs])},
  262:      {'tlsv1.2', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ since_1_2() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ [honor_client_cipher_order_tls12,
  263:                                                                                                 honor_server_cipher_order_tls12]},
  264:      {'tlsv1.1', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2()},
  265:      {'tlsv1', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2() ++ beast_mitigation_test()},
  266:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], gen_api_tests() -- [new_options_in_handshake, hibernate_server] ++
  267:           handshake_paus_tests() -- [handshake_continue_tls13_client] ++ pre_1_3()},
  268:      {'dtlsv1', [],  gen_api_tests() -- [new_options_in_handshake, hibernate_server] ++
  269:           handshake_paus_tests() -- [handshake_continue_tls13_client] ++ pre_1_3() ++ pre_1_2()}
  270:     ].
  271: 
  272: since_1_2() ->
  273:     [
  274:      conf_signature_algs,
  275:      no_common_signature_algs,
  276:      versions_option_based_on_sni,
  277:      ciphers_option_based_on_sni
  278:     ].
  279: 
  280: pre_1_3() ->
  281:     [
  282:      default_reject_anonymous,
  283:      connection_information_with_srp
  284:     ].
  285: 
  286: pre_1_2() ->
  287:     [honor_server_cipher_order,
  288:      honor_client_cipher_order].
  289: 
  290: simple_api_tests() ->
  291:     [
  292:      invalid_keyfile,
  293:      invalid_certfile,
  294:      invalid_cacertfile,
  295:      invalid_dhfile,
  296:      options_not_proplist,
  297:      options_whitebox,
  298:      format_error
  299:     ].
  300: 
  301: gen_api_tests() ->
  302:     [
  303:      peercert,
  304:      peercert_with_client_cert,
  305:      select_best_cert,
  306:      select_sha1_cert,
  307:      connection_information,
  308:      secret_connection_info,
  309:      keylog_connection_info,
  310:      versions,
  311:      new_options_in_handshake,
  312:      active_n,
  313:      dh_params,
  314:      hibernate_client,
  315:      hibernate_server,
  316:      listen_socket,
  317:      peername,
  318:      recv_active,

  322:      recv_timeout,
  323:      recv_close,
  324:      controlling_process,
  325:      controller_dies,
  326:      controlling_process_transport_accept_socket,

  330:      close_transport_accept,

  332:      der_input,

  339:      cipher_listing,
  340:      export_key_materials,
  341:      legacy_prf
  342:     ].
  343: 
  344: handshake_paus_tests() ->
  345:     [
  346:      handshake_continue, 
  347:      handshake_continue_timeout,
  348:      handshake_continue_change_verify,
  349:      hello_client_cancel,
  350:      hello_server_cancel,
  351:      handshake_continue_tls13_client
  352:     ].
  353: 
  354: %% Only relevant for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0
  355: beast_mitigation_test() ->
  356:     [%% Original option
  357:      rizzo_disabled,
  358:      %% Same effect as disable
  359:      rizzo_zero_n, 
  360:      %% Same as default
  361:      rizzo_one_n_minus_one 
  362:     ].
  363: 
  364: tls13_group() ->
  365:     [
  366:      supported_groups,
  367:      honor_server_cipher_order_tls13,
  368:      honor_client_cipher_order_tls13,
  369:      client_options_negative_version_gap,
  370:      client_options_negative_dependency_version,
  371:      client_options_negative_dependency_stateless,
  372:      client_options_negative_dependency_role,
  373:      client_options_negative_early_data,
  374:      server_options_negative_early_data,
  375:      server_options_negative_version_gap,
  376:      server_options_negative_dependency_role,
  377:      server_options_negative_stateless_tickets_seed,
  378:      invalid_options_tls13,
  379:      cookie,
  380:      exporter_master_secret_consumed
  381:     ].
  382: 
  383: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  384:     catch crypto:stop(),
  385:     try crypto:start() of
  386: 	ok ->
  387: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  388: 	    ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
  389:     catch _:_ ->
  390: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  391:     end.
  392: 
  393: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  394:     ssl:stop(),
  395:     application:unload(ssl),
  396:     application:stop(crypto).
  397: 
  398: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  399:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  400:         true  ->
  401:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, 
  402:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  403:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  404:                                          {version, GroupName}
  405:                                         | Config]);
  406:         false -> 
  407:             Config
  408:     end.
  409: 
  410: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  411:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  412: 
  413: init_per_testcase(handshake_continue_tls13_client, Config) ->
  414:     case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  415:         true ->
  416:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  417:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  418:             Config;
  419:         false ->
  420:             {skip, "Missing crypto support: TLS 1.3 not supported"}
  421:     end;
  422: init_per_testcase(connection_information_with_srp, Config) ->
  423:     PKAlg = proplists:get_value(public_keys, crypto:supports()),
  424:     case lists:member(srp, PKAlg) of
  425:         true ->
  426:             Config;
  427:         false ->
  428:             {skip, "Missing SRP crypto support"}
  429:     end;
  430: init_per_testcase(conf_signature_algs, Config) ->
  431:     case ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()) of
  432:         sha256 ->
  433:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  434:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  435:             Config;
  436:         sha ->
  437:             {skip, "Tests needs certs with sha256"}
  438:     end;
  439: init_per_testcase(check_random_nonce, Config) ->
  440:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  441:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  442:     Config;
  443: init_per_testcase(select_best_cert, Config) ->
  444:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  445:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  446:     %% We need to make sure TLS-1.3 can be supported as
  447:     %% want to generate a TLS-1.3 specific certificate that will not
  448:     %% be chosen
  449:     case Version of
  450:         'tlsv1.2' ->
  451:               case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  452:                   true ->
  453:                       Config;
  454:                   false ->
  455:                       {skip, "Crypto does not support EDDSA"}
  456:               end;
  457:         _ ->
  458:             Config
  459:     end;
  460: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  461:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  462:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  463:     Config.
  464: 
  465: end_per_testcase(internal_active_n, _Config) ->
  466:     application:unset_env(ssl, internal_active_n);
  467: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  468:     Config.
  469: 
  470: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  471: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  472: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  473: peercert() ->
  474:     [{doc,"Test API function peercert/1"}].
  475: peercert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  476:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  477:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  478:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  479: 
  480:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  481: 					{from, self()},
  482: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  483: 			   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  484:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  485:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  486: 					{host, Hostname},
  487: 			   {from, self()},
  488: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  489: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  490: 
  491:     CertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  492:     [{'Certificate', BinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CertFile),
  493: 
  494:     ServerMsg = {error, no_peercert},
  495:     ClientMsg = {ok, BinCert},
  496: 
  497:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  498: 
  499:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
  500: 
  501:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  502:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  503: 
  504: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  505: 
  506: peercert_with_client_cert() ->
  507:     [{doc,"Test API function peercert/1"}].
  508: peercert_with_client_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  509:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  510:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  511:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  512: 
  513:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  514: 					{from, self()},
  515: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  516: 			   {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  517:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  518:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  519: 					{host, Hostname},
  520: 			   {from, self()},
  521: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  522: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  523: 
  524:     ServerCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  525:     [{'Certificate', ServerBinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ServerCertFile),
  526:      ClientCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ClientOpts),
  527:     [{'Certificate', ClientBinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ClientCertFile),
  528: 
  529:     ServerMsg = {ok, ClientBinCert},
  530:     ClientMsg = {ok, ServerBinCert},
  531: 
  532:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  533: 
  534:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
  535: 
  536:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  537:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  538: 
  539: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  540: select_best_cert() ->
  541:     [{doc,"Basic test of the certs_keys option."}].
  542: 
  543: select_best_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  544:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  545:     Conf = test_config(Version, Config),
  546:     lists:foreach(
  547:       fun({#{server_config := SConfig,
  548:              client_config := CConfig},
  549:            {client_peer, CExpected},
  550:            {server_peer, SExpected}}) ->
  551:               selected_peer(CExpected, SExpected,
  552:                             ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(CConfig, Config),
  553:                             ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SConfig, Config),
  554:                             Conf)
  555:       end, Conf).
  556: 
  557: 
  558: 
  559: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  560: select_sha1_cert() ->
  561:     [{doc,"Use cert signed with rsa and sha1"}].
  562: 
  563: select_sha1_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  564:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  565:     TestConfRSA =
  566:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  567:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  568:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  569:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  570:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  571:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]
  572:                                          },
  573:                                     client_chain =>
  574:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  575:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
  576:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  577:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  578:                                           peer => [{digest, sha},
  579:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
  580: 
  581:     TestConfECDSA =
  582:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  583:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  584:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}],
  585:                                           intermediates =>
  586:                                               [[{digest, sha},
  587:                                                 {key,{namedCurve, secp256r1}}]],
  588:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha},
  589:                                                     {key,{namedCurve, secp256r1}}]
  590:                                          },
  591:                                     client_chain =>
  592:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  593:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}],
  594:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  595:                                                              {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}]],
  596:                                           peer => [{digest, sha},
  597:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}]}}),
  598:     test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, TestConfRSA, TestConfECDSA, Config).
  599: 
  600: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  601: connection_information() ->
  602:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/1"}].
  603: connection_information(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  604:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  605:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  606:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  607:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  608: 					{from, self()},
  609: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_information_result, []}},
  610: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  611: 
  612:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  613:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  614: 					{host, Hostname},
  615: 			   {from, self()},
  616: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, connection_information_result, []}},
  617: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  618: 
  619:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  620: 
  621:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  622: 
  623:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  624:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  625: 
  626: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  627: connection_information_with_srp() ->
  628:     [{doc,"Test the result of API function ssl:connection_information/1"
  629:           "includes srp_username."}].
  630: connection_information_with_srp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  631:     run_conn_info_srp_test(srp_anon, 'aes_128_cbc', Config).
  632: 
  633: run_conn_info_srp_test(Kex, Cipher, Config) ->
  634:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  635:     TestCiphers = ssl_test_lib:test_ciphers(Kex, Cipher, Version),
  636: 
  637:     case TestCiphers of
  638:         [] ->
  639:             {skip, {not_sup, Kex, Cipher, Version}};
  640:         [TestCipher | _T] ->
  641:             do_run_conn_info_srp_test(TestCipher, Version, Config)
  642:     end.
  643: 
  644: do_run_conn_info_srp_test(ErlangCipherSuite, Version, Config) ->
  645:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  646: 
  647:     SOpts = [{user_lookup_fun, {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, undefined}}],
  648:     COpts = [{verify, verify_none}, {srp_identity, {"Test-User", "secret"}}],
  649: 
  650:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts, Config),
  651:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts, Config),
  652: 
  653:     ?CT_LOG("Erlang Cipher Suite is: ~p~n", [ErlangCipherSuite]),
  654: 
  655:     Server =
  656:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  657:                                    {from, self()},
  658:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, check_srp_in_connection_information, [<<"Test-User">>, server]}},
  659:                                    {options, [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, [ErlangCipherSuite]} |
  660:                                               ServerOpts]}]),
  661:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  662:     Client =
  663:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  664:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  665:            {host, Hostname},
  666:            {from, self()},
  667:            {mfa, {?MODULE, check_srp_in_connection_information, [<<"Test-User">>, client]}},
  668:            {options, [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, [ErlangCipherSuite]} |
  669:                       ClientOpts]}]),
  670: 
  671:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  672: 
  673:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  674:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  675: 
  676: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  677: 
  678: secret_connection_info() ->
  679:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/2"}].
  680: secret_connection_info(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  681:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  682:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  683:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  684: 
  685:     Server =
  686:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  687:                                    {from, self()},
  688:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, secret_connection_info_result, []}},
  689:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  690:     
  691:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  692:     Client =
  693:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  694:                                    {host, Hostname},
  695:                                    {from, self()},
  696:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, secret_connection_info_result, []}},
  697:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
  698:     
  699:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  700: 			   
  701:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, true, Client, true),
  702:     
  703:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  704:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  705: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  706: keylog_connection_info() ->
  707:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/2"}].
  708: keylog_connection_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  709:     keylog_connection_info(Config, true),
  710:     keylog_connection_info(Config, false).
  711: keylog_connection_info(Config, KeepSecrets) ->
  712:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  713:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  714:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  715: 
  716:     Server =
  717:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  718:                                    {from, self()},
  719:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, keylog_connection_info_result, [KeepSecrets]}},
  720:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer}, {keep_secrets, KeepSecrets} | ServerOpts]}]),
  721: 
  722:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  723:     Client =
  724:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  725:                                    {host, Hostname},
  726:                                    {from, self()},
  727:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, keylog_connection_info_result, [KeepSecrets]}},
  728:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer}, {keep_secrets, KeepSecrets} |ClientOpts]}]),
  729: 
  730:     ?CT_LOG("KeepSecrets ~p Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [KeepSecrets, Client, Server]),
  731: 
  732:     ServerKeylog = receive
  733:                        {Server, {ok, Keylog}} ->
  734:                            Keylog;
  735:                        {Server, ServerError} ->
  736:                            ct:fail({server, ServerError})
  737:                    after 5000 ->
  738:                            ct:fail({server, timeout})
  739:                    end,
  740: 
  741:     receive
  742:         {Client, {ok, ServerKeylog}} ->
  743:             ok;
  744:         {Client, {ok, ClientKeylog}} ->
  745:             ct:fail({mismatch, {ServerKeylog, ClientKeylog}});
  746:         {Client, ClientError} ->
  747:             ct:fail({client, ClientError})
  748:     after 5000 ->
  749:             ct:fail({client, timeout})
  750:     end,
  751: 
  752:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  753:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  754: 
  755: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  756: dh_params() ->
  757:     [{doc,"Test to specify DH-params file in server."}].
  758: 
  759: dh_params(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  760:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  761:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  762:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  763:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
  764:     Ciphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.2'),
  765:                                        [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  766:                                                           (srp_anon) -> false;
  767:                                                           (srp_dss) -> false;
  768:                                                           (_) -> true end}]),
  769: 
  770:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  771:     
  772:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  773: 					{from, self()}, 
  774: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  775: 			   {options, [{dhfile, DHParamFile}, {ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts]}]),
  776:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  777:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  778: 					{host, Hostname},
  779: 			   {from, self()}, 
  780: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  781: 			   {options,
  782: 			    [{ciphers,[{dhe_rsa,aes_256_cbc,sha}]} | 
  783: 				       ClientOpts]}]),
  784:     
  785:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  786:     
  787:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  788:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  789: 
  790: 
  791: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  792: invalid_dhfile() ->
  793:     [{doc,"Test to check invalid DH-params file in server."}].
  794: invalid_dhfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  795:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  796:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  797:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  798:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam-invalid.pem"),
  799: 
  800:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  801: 
  802:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  803:                                               {from, self()},
  804:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  805:                                                      send_recv_result_active,
  806:                                                      []}},
  807:                                                {options, [{dhfile, DHParamFile}
  808:                                                           | ServerOpts]}]),
  809:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  810:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  811:                                               {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
  812:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  813:                                                      send_recv_result_active,
  814:                                                      []}},
  815:                                               {options, [{ciphers,
  816:                                                           [{dhe_rsa,
  817:                                                             aes_256_cbc, sha}]}
  818:                                                          | ClientOpts]}]),
  819: 
  820:     %% assert server error
  821:     [{Server, {error, {options, {dhfile, DHParamFile,
  822:                                  {error, {asn1,
  823:                                           {{invalid_value, 0}, _Stack}}}}}}}] =
  824:         ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server]),
  825: 
  826:     %% assert client error
  827:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, {error, closed}),
  828: 
  829:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  830:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  831: 
  832: 
  833: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  834: conf_signature_algs() ->
  835:     [{doc,"Test to set the signature_algs option on both client and server"}].
  836: conf_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  837:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  838:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  839:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  840:     Server = 
  841: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  842: 				   {from, self()}, 
  843: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  844: 				   {options,  [{active, false}, {signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]}, 
  845:                                                {versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  846:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  847:     Client = 
  848: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  849: 				   {host, Hostname},
  850: 				   {from, self()}, 
  851: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  852: 				   {options, [{active, false}, {signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]},
  853:                                               {versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts]}]),
  854:     
  855:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  856:     
  857:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  858:     
  859:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  860:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  861: 
  862: 
  863: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  864: no_common_signature_algs()  ->
  865:     [{doc,"Set the signature_algs option so that there client and server does not share any hash sign algorithms"}].
  866: no_common_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  867:     
  868:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  869:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  870: 
  871:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  872: 
  873: 
  874:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  875: 					      {from, self()},
  876: 					      {options, [{signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]}
  877: 							 | ServerOpts]}]),
  878:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  879:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  880:                                               {host, Hostname},
  881:                                               {from, self()},
  882:                                               {options, [{signature_algs, [{sha384, rsa}]}
  883:                                                          | ClientOpts]}]),
  884:     
  885:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
  886: 
  887: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  888: handshake_continue() ->
  889:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3"}].
  890: handshake_continue(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  891:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  892:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  893:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  894: 
  895:     Server =
  896:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  897:                                    {host, Hostname},
  898:                                    {from, self()},
  899:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  900:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true},
  901:                                                                             {verify, verify_peer},
  902:                                                                        {handshake, hello} | ServerOpts
  903:                                                                       ],
  904:                                                                       Config)},
  905:                                    {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}
  906:                                   ]),
  907:     
  908:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  909: 
  910:     Client =
  911:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  912:                                    {host, Hostname},
  913:                                    {from, self()},
  914:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  915:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
  916:                                                                        {verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts
  917:                                                                       ],
  918:                                                                       Config)},
  919:                                    {continue_options,  [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  920:      
  921:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  922:     
  923:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  924:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  925: 
  926: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  927: handshake_continue_tls13_client() ->
  928:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3 with fixed TLS 1.3 client"}].
  929: handshake_continue_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  930:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  931:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  932:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  933:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  934:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  935:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  936:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  937:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  938:     Server =
  939:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  940:                                    {from, self()},
  941:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  942:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true},
  943:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer},
  944:                                                                        {ciphers, SCiphers},
  945:                                                                       {handshake, hello} | ServerOpts
  946:                                                                       ],
  947:                                                                      Config)},
  948:                                    {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}
  949:                                   ]),
  950: 
  951:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  952: 
  953:     DummyTicket =
  954:         <<131,116,0,0,0,5,100,0,4,104,107,100,102,100,0,6,115,104,97,51,
  955:           56,52,100,0,3,112,115,107,109,0,0,0,48,150,90,38,127,26,12,5,
  956:           228,180,235,229,214,215,27,236,149,182,82,14,140,50,81,0,150,
  957:           248,152,180,193,207,80,52,107,196,200,2,77,4,96,140,65,239,205,
  958:           224,125,129,179,147,103,100,0,3,115,110,105,107,0,25,112,114,
  959:           111,117,100,102,111,111,116,46,111,116,112,46,101,114,105,99,
  960:           115,115,111,110,46,115,101,100,0,6,116,105,99,107,101,116,104,6,
  961:           100,0,18,110,101,119,95,115,101,115,115,105,111,110,95,116,105,
  962:           99,107,101,116,98,0,0,28,32,98,127,110,83,249,109,0,0,0,8,0,0,0,
  963:           0,0,0,0,5,109,0,0,0,113,112,154,74,26,27,0,111,147,51,110,216,
  964:           43,45,4,100,215,152,195,118,96,22,34,1,184,170,42,166,238,109,
  965:           187,138,196,147,102,205,116,83,241,174,227,232,156,148,60,153,3,
  966:           175,128,115,192,36,103,191,239,58,222,192,172,190,239,92,8,131,
  967:           195,0,217,187,222,143,104,6,86,53,93,27,218,198,205,138,223,202,
  968:           11,55,168,104,6,219,228,217,157,37,52,205,252,165,135,167,116,
  969:           216,172,231,222,189,84,97,0,8,106,108,88,47,114,48,116,0,0,0,0,
  970:           100,0,9,116,105,109,101,115,116,97,109,112,98,93,205,0,44>>,
  971: 
  972:     %% Send dummy session ticket to trigger sending of pre_shared_key and
  973:     %% psk_key_exchange_modes extensions.
  974:     Client =
  975:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  976:                                    {host, Hostname},
  977:                                    {from, self()},
  978:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  979:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
  980:                                                                        {session_tickets, manual},
  981:                                                                        {use_ticket, [DummyTicket]},
  982:                                                                        {versions, ['tlsv1.3',
  983:                                                                                    'tlsv1.2',
  984:                                                                                    'tlsv1.1',
  985:                                                                                    'tlsv1'
  986:                                                                                   ]},
  987:                                                                        {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3')},
  988:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts
  989:                                                                       ],
  990:                                                                       Config)},
  991:                                    {continue_options,  proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ClientOpts)}]),
  992: 
  993:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  994: 
  995:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  996:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).

  998: %%------------------------------------------------------------------
  999: handshake_continue_timeout() ->
 1000:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3 with short timeout"}].
 1001: handshake_continue_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1002:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1003:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1004:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1005: 
 1006:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1007:                                         {from, self()},
 1008:                                         {timeout, 1},
 1009:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true}, {handshake, hello},
 1010:                                                                             {verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts],
 1011:                                                                            Config)},
 1012:                                         {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}
 1013:                                        ]),
 1014: 
 1015:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1016: 
 1017: 
 1018:     ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1019:                                      {host, Hostname},
 1020:                                      {from, self()},
 1021:                                      {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1022:     
 1023:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,timeout}),
 1024:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
 1025: 
 1026: handshake_continue_change_verify() ->
 1027:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue with updated verify option. "
 1028:       "Use a verification that will fail to make sure verification is run"}].
 1029: handshake_continue_change_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1030:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1031:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1032:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1033: 
 1034:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 1035:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1036:                 {from, self()},
 1037:                 {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(
 1038:                             [{handshake, hello},
 1039:                              {verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts], Config)},
 1040:                 {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}]),
 1041: 
 1042:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1043: 
 1044:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
 1045:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1046:                 {host, Hostname},
 1047:                 {from, self()},
 1048:                 {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(
 1049:                             [{handshake, hello},
 1050:                              {server_name_indication, "foobar"},
 1051:                              {verify, verify_none}
 1052:                             | ClientOpts], Config)},
 1053:                 {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1054:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client,  handshake_failure).
 1055: 
 1056: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1057: hello_client_cancel() ->
 1058:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_cancel/1 on the client side"}].
 1059: hello_client_cancel(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1060:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1061:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1062:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1063: 
 1064:     Server =
 1065:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1066:                                    {host, Hostname},
 1067:                                    {from, self()},
 1068:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
 1069:                                                                        {verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts], Config)},
 1070:                                    {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1071:     
 1072:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1073: 
 1074:     %% That is ssl:handshake_cancel returns ok
 1075:     {connect_failed, ok} =
 1076:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1077:                                    {host, Hostname},
 1078:                                    {from, self()},
 1079:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello}
 1080:                                                                       | ClientOpts], Config)},
 1081:                                    {continue_options, cancel}]),
 1082:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, user_canceled).
 1083: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

 1096:                                                                       ], Config)},

 1100:

 1112: versions() ->
 1113:     [{doc,"Test API function versions/0"}].

 1116:     [_|_] = Versions = ssl:versions(),
 1117:     ?CT_LOG("~p~n", [Versions]).
 1118: 
 1119: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1120: 
 1121: versions_option_based_on_sni() ->
 1122:     [{doc,"Test that SNI versions option is selected over default versions"}].
 1123: 
 1124: versions_option_based_on_sni(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1125:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1126:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1127:     TestVersion = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 1128:     {Version, Versions} = test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni(TestVersion),
 1129:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1130:     Ciphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, TestVersion),
 1131:                                        [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa) -> false;
 1132:                                                           (srp_dss) -> false;
 1133:                                                           (_) -> true
 1134:                                                        end}]),
 1135: 
 1136:     SNI = net_adm:localhost(),
 1137:     Fun = fun(ServerName) ->
 1138:               case ServerName of
 1139:                   SNI ->
 1140:                       [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts];
 1141:                   _ ->
 1142:                       ServerOpts
 1143:               end
 1144:           end,
 1145: 
 1146:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1147: 					{from, self()},
 1148: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, protocol_version_check, [Version]}},
 1149: 					{options, [{sni_fun, Fun},
 1150:                                                    {versions, Versions} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1151:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1152:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1153: 					{host, Hostname},
 1154: 					{from, self()},
 1155: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1156: 					{options, [{server_name_indication, SNI}, {versions, Versions},
 1157:                                                    {ciphers, Ciphers}
 1158:                                                   | ClientOpts]}]),
 1159: 
 1160:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1161:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1162:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1163: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1164: 
 1165: ciphers_option_based_on_sni() ->
 1166:     [{doc,"Test that SNI versions option is selected over default ciphers option"}].
 1167: 
 1168: ciphers_option_based_on_sni(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1169:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1170:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1171:     TestVersion = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 1172:     Suites = rsa_cipher_suites_not_default(TestVersion),
 1173:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1174: 
 1175:     SNI = net_adm:localhost(),
 1176:     Fun = fun(ServerName) ->
 1177:               case ServerName of
 1178:                   SNI ->
 1179:                       [{ciphers, Suites} | ServerOpts];
 1180:                   _ ->
 1181:                       ServerOpts
 1182:               end
 1183:           end,
 1184: 
 1185:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1186: 					{from, self()},
 1187: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, suite_check, [TestVersion]}},
 1188: 					{options, [{sni_fun, Fun} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1189:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1190:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1191: 					{host, Hostname},
 1192: 					{from, self()},
 1193: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1194: 					{options, [{server_name_indication, SNI} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1195: 
 1196:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1197:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1198:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1199: 
 1200: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1201: %% Test case adapted from gen_tcp_misc_SUITE.
 1202: active_n() ->
 1203:     [{doc,"Test {active,N} option"}].
 1204: 
 1205: active_n(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1206:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1207:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1208:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(node()),
 1209:     Host = net_adm:localhost(),
 1210:     N = 3,
 1211:     LS = ok(ssl:listen(Port, [{active,N}|ServerOpts])),
 1212:     [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(LS, [active])),
 1213:     active_n_common(LS, N),
 1214:     Self = self(),
 1215:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1216:         S0 = ok(ssl:transport_accept(LS)),
 1217:         {ok, S} = ssl:handshake(S0),
 1218:         ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 1219:         [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 1220:         ssl:controlling_process(S, Self),
 1221:         Self ! {server, S}
 1222:     end),
 1223:     C = ok(ssl:connect(Host, Port, [{active,N}|ClientOpts])),
 1224:     [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(C, [active])),
 1225:     S = receive
 1226:         {server, S0} -> S0
 1227:     after
 1228:         1000 ->
 1229:             exit({error, connect})
 1230:     end,
 1231:     active_n_common(C, N),
 1232:     active_n_common(S, N),
 1233:     ok = ssl:setopts(C, [{active,N}]),
 1234:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 1235:     ReceiveMsg = fun(Socket, Msg) ->
 1236:         receive
 1237:             {ssl,Socket,Msg} ->
 1238:                 ok;
 1239:             {ssl,Socket,Begin} ->
 1240:                 receive
 1241:                     {ssl,Socket,End} ->
 1242:                         Msg = Begin ++ End,
 1243:                         ok
 1244:                 after 1000 ->
 1245:                     exit(timeout)
 1246:                 end
 1247:         after 1000 ->
 1248:             exit(timeout)
 1249:         end
 1250:     end,
 1251:     repeat(3, fun(I) ->
 1252:         Msg = "message "++integer_to_list(I),
 1253:         ok = ssl:send(C, Msg),
 1254:         ReceiveMsg(S, Msg),
 1255:         ok = ssl:send(S, Msg),
 1256:         ReceiveMsg(C, Msg)
 1257:     end),
 1258:     receive
 1259:         {ssl_passive,S} ->
 1260:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active]))
 1261:     after
 1262:         1000 ->
 1263:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1264:     end,
 1265:     receive
 1266:         {ssl_passive,C} ->
 1267:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(C, [active]))
 1268:     after
 1269:         1000 ->
 1270:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1271:     end,
 1272:     LS2 = ok(ssl:listen(0, [{active,0}])),
 1273:     receive
 1274:         {ssl_passive,LS2} ->
 1275:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(LS2, [active]))
 1276:     after
 1277:         1000 ->
 1278:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1279:     end,
 1280:     ok = ssl:close(LS2),
 1281:     ok = ssl:close(C),
 1282:     ok = ssl:close(S),
 1283:     ok = ssl:close(LS),
 1284:     ok.
 1285: 
 1286: hibernate_client() ->
 1287:     [{doc,"Check that an SSL connection on client side that is started with "
 1288:       "option hibernate_after indeed hibernates after inactivity"}].
 1289: 
 1290: hibernate_client(Config) ->
 1291:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1292:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1293:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1294:     StartServerOpts = [return_socket, {node, ServerNode},
 1295:                        {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 1296:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 1297:                        {options, [{hibernate_after, infinity} | ServerOpts]}],
 1298:     StartClientOpts = [return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {host, Hostname},
 1299:                        {from, self()},
 1300:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1301:     [ok = hibernate_helper(?config(version, Config), false,
 1302:                            StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1303:                            ServerOpts, ClientOpts, T, infinity) ||
 1304:         T <- [1000, 0, 1]].
 1305: 
 1306: hibernate_server() ->
 1307:     [{doc,"Check that an SSL connection on server side that is started with "
 1308:       "option hibernate_after indeed hibernates after inactivity."
 1309:       "Note: for DTLS test will not be stable, because cookie secret refresh "
 1310:       "mechanism might disturb hibernation of a server process."}].
 1311: hibernate_server(Config) ->
 1312:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1313:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1314:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1315:     StartServerOpts = [return_socket, {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1316:                        {from, self()},
 1317:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1318:     StartClientOpts = [return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {host, Hostname},
 1319:                        {from, self()},
 1320:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1321:     [ok = hibernate_helper(?config(version, Config), true,
 1322:                            StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1323:                            ServerOpts, ClientOpts, infinity, T) ||
 1324:         T <- [1000, 0, 1]].
 1325: 
 1326: hibernate_helper(Version, CheckServer, StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1327:                  ServerOpts0, ClientOpts0,
 1328:                  ClientHibernateAfter, ServerHibernateAfter) ->
 1329:     AllServerOpts = StartServerOpts ++
 1330:         [{options, [{hibernate_after, ServerHibernateAfter} | ServerOpts0]}],
 1331:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(AllServerOpts),
 1332:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1333:     AllClientOpts = StartClientOpts ++
 1334:         [{port, Port},
 1335:          {options, [{hibernate_after, ClientHibernateAfter} | ClientOpts0]}],
 1336:     {Client, #sslsocket{pid = [ClientReceiverPid | ClientPotentialSenderPid]}} =
 1337:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(AllClientOpts),
 1338:     Results = ssl_test_lib:get_result([Client, Server]),
 1339:     {ok, ServerAcceptSocket} = proplists:get_value(Server, Results),
 1340:     ok = proplists:get_value(Client, Results),
 1341:     #sslsocket{pid = [ServerReceiverPid | ServerPotentialSenderPid]} =
 1342:         ServerAcceptSocket,
 1343:     {ReceiverPid, PotentialSenderPid, HibernateAfter} =
 1344:         case CheckServer of
 1345:             true -> {ServerReceiverPid, ServerPotentialSenderPid,
 1346:                      ServerHibernateAfter};
 1347:             false -> {ClientReceiverPid, ClientPotentialSenderPid,
 1348:                       ClientHibernateAfter}
 1349:         end,
 1350:     SleepAmount = max(1.5*HibernateAfter, 500),
 1351:     ?CT_LOG("HibernateAfter = ~w SleepAmount = ~w", [HibernateAfter, SleepAmount]),
 1352:     ct:sleep(SleepAmount), %% Schedule out
 1353:     {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
 1354: 	process_info(ReceiverPid, current_function),
 1355:     IsTls = ssl_test_lib:is_tls_version(Version),
 1356:     case IsTls of
 1357:         true ->
 1358:             [SenderPid] = PotentialSenderPid,
 1359:             {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
 1360:                 process_info(SenderPid, current_function);
 1361:         _ -> %% DTLS (no sender process)
 1362:             ok
 1363:     end,
 1364:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1365:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 1366:     ok.
 1367: 
 1368: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1369: listen_socket() ->
 1370:     [{doc,"Check error handling and inet compliance when calling API functions with listen sockets."}].
 1371: 
 1372: listen_socket(Config) ->
 1373:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1374:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(0, ServerOpts),
 1375:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, ServerOpts, tls),
 1376:     %% This can be a valid thing to do as
 1377:     %% options are inherited by the accept socket
 1378:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(ListenSocket, self()),
 1379: 
 1380:     {ok, _} = ssl:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1381: 
 1382:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:send(ListenSocket, <<"data">>),
 1383:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:recv(ListenSocket, 0),
 1384:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:connection_information(ListenSocket),
 1385:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:peername(ListenSocket),
 1386:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:peercert(ListenSocket),
 1387:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:renegotiate(ListenSocket),
 1388:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:export_key_materials(ListenSocket, [<<"Label">>], [<<"Context">>], 256),
 1389:     %% Legacy test
 1390:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:prf(ListenSocket, master_secret,
 1391:                                 <<"Label">>, [client_random, server_random], 256),
 1392:     case Protocol of
 1393:         tls ->
 1394:             {error, enotconn} = ssl:shutdown(ListenSocket, read_write);
 1395:         dtls ->
 1396:             {error, notsup} = ssl:shutdown(ListenSocket, read_write)
 1397:     end,
 1398:     ok = ssl:close(ListenSocket).
 1399: 
 1400: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1401: peername() ->
 1402:     [{doc,"Test API function peername/1"}].
 1403: 
 1404: peername(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1405:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1406:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1407:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1408: 
 1409:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 1410:                [
 1411:                 {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1412:                 {from, self()},
 1413:                 {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1414:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1415:     {Client, CSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client(
 1416:                           [return_socket,
 1417:                            {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1418:                            {host, Hostname},
 1419:                            {from, self()},
 1420:                            {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1421: 
 1422:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1423: 
 1424:     Server ! get_socket,
 1425:     SSocket =
 1426:         receive
 1427:             {Server, {socket, Socket}} ->
 1428:                 Socket
 1429:         end,
 1430: 
 1431:     {ok, ServerPeer} = ssl:peername(SSocket),
 1432:     ?CT_LOG("Server's peer: ~p~n", [ServerPeer]),
 1433:     {ok, ClientPeer} = ssl:peername(CSocket),
 1434:     ?CT_LOG("Client's peer: ~p~n", [ClientPeer]),
 1435: 
 1436:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1437:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1438: 
 1439: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1440: 
 1441: recv_active() ->
 1442:     [{doc,"Test recv on active socket"}].

 1444: recv_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

 1446:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1447:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1448:     Server = 
 1449: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1450: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1451: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, try_recv_active, []}},
 1452: 				   {options,  [{active, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1453:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1454:     Client = 
 1455: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1456: 				   {host, Hostname},
 1457: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1458: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, try_recv_active, []}},
 1459: 				   {options, [{active, true} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1460:         
 1461:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1462:

 1464:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).

 1466: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1467: recv_active_once() ->
 1468:     [{doc,"Test recv on active (once) socket"}].
 1469: 
 1470: recv_active_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1471:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1472:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1473:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1474:     Server = 
 1475: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1476: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1477: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, try_recv_active_once, []}},
 1478: 				   {options,  [{active, once} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1479:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1480:     Client = 
 1481: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1482: 				   {host, Hostname},
 1483: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1484: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, try_recv_active_once, []}},
 1485: 				   {options, [{active, once} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1486:         
 1487:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1488:     
 1489:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1490:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1491: 
 1492: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1493: recv_active_n() ->
 1494:     [{doc,"Test recv on active (n) socket"}].
 1495: 
 1496: recv_active_n(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1497:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1498:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1499:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1500:     Server =
 1501: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1502: 				   {from, self()},
 1503: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, try_recv_active_once, []}},
 1504: 				   {options,  [{active, 1} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1505:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1506:     Client =
 1507: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1508: 				   {host, Hostname},
 1509: 				   {from, self()},
 1510: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, try_recv_active_once, []}},
 1511: 				   {options, [{active, 1} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1512: 
 1513:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1514: 
 1515:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1516:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1517: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1518: recv_timeout() ->
 1519:     [{doc,"Test ssl:recv timeout"}].
 1520: 
 1521: recv_timeout(Config) ->
 1522:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1523:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1524: 
 1525:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1526: 
 1527:     Server =
 1528: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1529: 				   {from, self()},
 1530: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, send_recv_result_timeout_server, []}},
 1531: 				   {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1532:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1533: 
 1534:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1535: 					{host, Hostname},
 1536: 					{from, self()},
 1537: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
 1538: 					       send_recv_result_timeout_client, []}},
 1539: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1540: 
 1541:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok),
 1542:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1543:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1544: 
 1545: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1546: recv_close() ->
 1547:     [{doc,"Special case of call error handling"}].
 1548: recv_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1549:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1550:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1551: 
 1552:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1553:     Server  = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1554: 					  {from, self()},
 1555: 					  {mfa, {?MODULE, do_recv_close, []}},
 1556: 					 {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1557:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1558:     {_Client, #sslsocket{} = SslSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 1559: 									   {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1560: 									   {host, Hostname},
 1561: 									   {from, self()},
 1562: 									   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1563: 									   {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1564:     ssl:close(SslSocket),
 1565:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok).
 1566:

 1568: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1569: recv_no_active_msg() ->
 1570:     [{doc,"If we have a passive socket and do not call recv and peer closes we should no get"
 1571:       "receive an active message"}].
 1572: recv_no_active_msg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1573:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1574:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1575: 
 1576:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1577:     Server  = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1578: 					  {from, self()},
 1579: 					  {mfa, {?MODULE, no_recv_no_active, []}},
 1580: 					 {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1581:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1582:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1583:                                         {host, Hostname},
 1584:                                         {from, self()},
 1585:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1586:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1587:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 1588:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok).
 1589: 
 1590: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1591: controlling_process() ->
 1592:     [{doc,"Test API function controlling_process/2"}].
 1593: 
 1594: controlling_process(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1595:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1596:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1597:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1598:     ClientMsg = "Server hello",
 1599:     ServerMsg = "Client hello",
 1600:    
 1601:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([
 1602:                                         {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1603:                                         {from, self()}, 
 1604:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1605:                                                controlling_process_result, [self(),
 1606:                                                                             ServerMsg]}},
 1607:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1608:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1609:     {Client, CSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 1610:                                                    {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1611:                                                    {host, Hostname},
 1612:                                         {from, self()}, 
 1613: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1614: 				  controlling_process_result, [self(),
 1615: 							       ClientMsg]}},
 1616: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1617:     
 1618:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1619:     
 1620:     ServerMsg = ssl_test_lib:active_recv(CSocket, length(ServerMsg)),
 1621:     %% We do not have the TLS server socket but all messages form the client
 1622:     %% socket are now read, so ramining are form the server socket
 1623:     ClientMsg = ssl_active_recv(length(ClientMsg)),
 1624: 
 1625:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1626:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1627: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1628: controller_dies() ->
 1629:     [{doc,"Test that the socket is closed after controlling process dies"}].
 1630: controller_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1631:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1632:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1633:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1634:     ClientMsg = "Hello server",
 1635:     ServerMsg = "Hello client",
 1636: 
 1637:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1638: 					{from, self()}, 
 1639: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1640: 					       controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1641: 									ServerMsg]}},
 1642: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 1643:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1644:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1645: 					{host, Hostname},
 1646: 					{from, self()}, 
 1647: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1648: 					       controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1649: 									    ClientMsg]}},
 1650: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 1651: 
 1652:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1653:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP), %% so that they are connected
 1654:     
 1655:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1656: 
 1657:     %% Test that clients die
 1658:     exit(Client, killed),
 1659:     get_close(Client, ?LINE),
 1660: 
 1661:     %% Test that clients die when process disappear
 1662:     Server ! listen, 
 1663:     Tester = self(),
 1664:     Connect = fun(Pid) ->
 1665: 		      {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
 1666: 		      %% Make sure server finishes and verification
 1667: 		      %% and is in coonection state before
 1668: 		      %% killing client
 1669: 		      ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 1670: 		      Pid ! {self(), connected, Socket},
 1671: 		      receive die_nice -> normal end
 1672: 	      end,
 1673:     Client2 = spawn_link(fun() -> Connect(Tester) end),
 1674:     receive {Client2, connected, _Socket} ->  Client2 ! die_nice end,
 1675:     
 1676:     get_close(Client2, ?LINE),
 1677:     
 1678:     %% Test that clients die when the controlling process have changed 
 1679:     Server ! listen, 
 1680: 
 1681:     Client3 = spawn_link(fun() -> Connect(Tester) end),
 1682:     Controller = spawn_link(fun() -> receive die_nice -> normal end end),
 1683:     receive 
 1684: 	{Client3, connected, Socket} ->  
 1685: 	    ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Controller),
 1686: 	    Client3 ! die_nice 
 1687:     end,
 1688: 
 1689:     ?CT_LOG("Waiting on exit ~p~n",[Client3]),
 1690:     receive {'EXIT', Client3, normal} -> ok end,
 1691:     
 1692:     receive   %% Client3 is dead but that doesn't matter, socket should not be closed.
 1693: 	Unexpected ->
 1694: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 1695: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 1696:     after 1000 ->
 1697: 	    ok
 1698:     end,
 1699:     Controller ! die_nice,
 1700:     get_close(Controller, ?LINE),
 1701:     
 1702:     %% Test that servers die
 1703:     Server ! listen, 
 1704:     LastClient = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1705: 					    {host, Hostname},
 1706: 					    {from, self()}, 
 1707: 					    {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1708: 						   controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1709: 									    ClientMsg]}},
 1710: 					    {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1711:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP), %% so that they are connected
 1712:     
 1713:     exit(Server, killed),
 1714:     get_close(Server, ?LINE),
 1715:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1716:     ssl_test_lib:close(LastClient).
 1717: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1718: controlling_process_transport_accept_socket() ->
 1719:     [{doc,"Only ssl:handshake and ssl:controlling_process is allowed for transport_accept:sockets"}].
 1720: controlling_process_transport_accept_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1721:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1722:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1723:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1724: 
 1725:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_transport_control([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1726:                                                           {port, 0},
 1727:                                                           {from, self()},
 1728:                                                           {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1729:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1730:     
 1731:     _Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1732:                                               {host, Hostname},
 1733:                                               {from, self()},
 1734:                                               {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1735:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1736:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
 1737: 
 1738: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1739: close_with_timeout() ->
 1740:       [{doc,"Test normal (not downgrade) ssl:close/2"}].
 1741: close_with_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1742:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1743:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1744:     
 1745:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1746: 
 1747:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1748: 					{from, self()},
 1749: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, tls_close, []}},
 1750: 					{options,[{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1751:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1752:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1753: 					{host, Hostname},
 1754: 					{from, self()},
 1755: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, tls_close, []}},
 1756: 					{options, [{active, false} |ClientOpts]}]),
 1757: 
 1758:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 1759: 
 1760: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1761: close_in_error_state() ->
 1762:     [{doc,"Special case of closing socket in error state"}].
 1763: close_in_error_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1764:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1765:     ServerOpts = [{cacertfile, "foo.pem"} | proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)],
 1766:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
 1767: 
 1768:     _ = spawn(?MODULE, run_error_server_close, [[self() | ServerOpts]]),
 1769:     receive
 1770:         {_Pid, Port} ->
 1771:             spawn_link(?MODULE, run_client_error, [[Port, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]]])
 1772:     end,
 1773:     receive
 1774:         ok ->
 1775:             ok;
 1776:         Other ->
 1777:             ct:fail(Other)
 1778:     end.
 1779: 
 1780: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1781: call_in_error_state() ->
 1782:     [{doc,"Special case of call error handling"}].
 1783: call_in_error_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1784:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1785:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
 1786:     ServerOpts = [{cacertfile, "foo.pem"} | proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)],
 1787:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, run_error_server, [[self() | ServerOpts]]),
 1788:     receive
 1789:         {Pid, Port} ->
 1790:             spawn_link(?MODULE, run_client_error, [[Port, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]]])
 1791:     end,
 1792:     receive
 1793:         {error, closed} ->
 1794:             ok;
 1795:         Other ->
 1796:             ct:fail(Other)
 1797:     end.
 1798: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1799: close_transport_accept() ->
 1800:     [{doc,"Tests closing ssl socket when waiting on ssl:transport_accept/1"}].
 1801: 
 1802: close_transport_accept(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1803:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1804:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1805: 
 1806:     Port = 0,
 1807:     Opts = [{active, false} | ServerOpts],
 1808:     {ok, ListenSocket} = rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, listen, [Port, Opts]),
 1809:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1810: 			ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 1811: 			rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, close, [ListenSocket])
 1812: 	       end),
 1813:     case rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, transport_accept, [ListenSocket]) of
 1814: 	{error, closed} ->
 1815: 	    ok;
 1816: 	Other ->
 1817: 	    exit({?LINE, Other})
 1818:     end.
 1819: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1820: abuse_transport_accept_socket() ->
 1821:     [{doc,"Only ssl:handshake and ssl:controlling_process is allowed for transport_accept:sockets"}].
 1822: abuse_transport_accept_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1823:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1824:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1825:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1826: 
 1827:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_transport_abuse_socket([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1828:                                                                {port, 0},
 1829:                                                                {from, self()},
 1830:                                                                {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1831:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1832:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1833:                                         {host, Hostname},
 1834:                                         {from, self()},
 1835:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1836:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1837:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1838:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1839:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
