 1843: invalid_keyfile() ->
 1844:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid key file"}].
 1845: invalid_keyfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1846:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1847:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1848:     BadKeyFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1849: 			      "badkey.pem"]),
 1850:     BadOpts = [{keyfile, BadKeyFile}| proplists:delete(keyfile, ServerOpts)],
 1851:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1852: 
 1853:     Server = 
 1854: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1855: 					 {from, self()},
 1856: 			    {options, BadOpts}]),
 1857: 
 1858:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1859: 
 1860:     Client =
 1861: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 1862: 			    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 1863: 			    {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1864: 
 1865:     File = proplists:get_value(keyfile,BadOpts),    
 1866:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server,
 1867:                               {error,{options, {keyfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, Client,
 1868:                               {error, closed}).
 1869: 
 1870: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1871: honor_server_cipher_order_tls12() ->
 1872:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1873: honor_server_cipher_order_tls12(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1874:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1875:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1876:                        mac => aead,
 1877:                        prf => sha256},
 1878:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1879:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1880:                        mac => aead,
 1881:                        prf => sha384}],
 1882:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1883:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1884:                        mac => aead,
 1885:                        prf => sha384},
 1886:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1887:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1888:                        mac => aead,
 1889:                        prf => sha256}],
 1890:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 1891:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1892:                                         cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1893:                                         mac => aead,
 1894:                                         prf => sha384}).
 1895: 
 1896: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1897: 
 1898: honor_client_cipher_order_tls12() ->
 1899:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1900: honor_client_cipher_order_tls12(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1901:      ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1902:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1903:                        mac => aead,
 1904:                        prf => sha256},
 1905:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1906:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1907:                        mac => aead,
 1908:                        prf => sha384}],
 1909:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1910:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 1911:                        mac => aead,
 1912:                        prf => sha384},
 1913:                      #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1914:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1915:                        mac => aead,
 1916:                        prf => sha256}],
 1917:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers,
 1918:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => ecdhe_rsa,
 1919:                                         cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 1920:                                         mac => aead,
 1921:                                         prf => sha256}).
 1922:

 1924: honor_server_cipher_order() ->
 1925:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1926: honor_server_cipher_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1927:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1928:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 1929:                        mac => sha,
 1930:                        prf => default_prf},
 1931:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1932:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1933:                        mac => sha,
 1934:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1935:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1936:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1937:                        mac => sha,
 1938:                        prf => default_prf},
 1939:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1940:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 1941:                        mac => sha,
 1942:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1943:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 1944:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1945:                                         cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1946:                                         mac => sha,
 1947:                                         prf => default_prf}).
 1948:

 1977: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1978: ipv6() ->
 1979:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 1980:      {doc,"Test ipv6."}].
 1981: ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1982:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 1983:     
 1984:     case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)) of
 1985: 	true ->
 1986: 	    ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1987: 	    ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1988: 	    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = 
 1989: 		ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config, ipv6),
 1990: 	    Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1991: 				   {port, 0}, {from, self()}, 
 1992: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1993: 				   {options,  
 1994: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1995: 	    Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server), 
 1996: 	    Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
 1997: 				   {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 1998: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1999: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2000: 				   {options, 
 2001: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2002: 	    
 2003: 	    ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 2004: 	    
 2005: 	    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 2006: 	    
 2007: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2008: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Client);
 2009: 	false ->
 2010: 	    {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
 2011:     end.
 2012: 
 2013: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2014: der_input() ->
 2015:     [{doc,"Test to input certs and key as der"}].
 2016: 
 2017: der_input(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2018:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2019:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
 2020: 
 2021:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
 2022:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
 2023:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
 2024:     [CADb | _] = element(5, State),
 2025:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP*2), %%Make sure there is no outstanding clean cert db msg in manager
 2026:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2027:     ?CT_LOG("Size ~p", [Size]),
 2028: 
 2029:     SeverVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2030:     {ServerCert, ServerKey, ServerCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 2031: 								       SeverVerifyOpts]),
 2032:     ClientVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2033:     {ClientCert, ClientKey, ClientCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 2034: 								       ClientVerifyOpts]),
 2035:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 2036: 		  {dh, DHParams},
 2037: 		  {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey}, {cacerts, ServerCaCerts}],
 2038:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 2039: 		  {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey}, {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
 2040:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2041:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2042: 					{from, self()},
 2043: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2044: 					{options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 2045:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2046:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 2047: 					{host, Hostname},
 2048: 					{from, self()},
 2049: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2050: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2051: 
 2052:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 2053:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2054:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 2055:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 2056:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2057: 
 2058:     ServerOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 2059:                    {dh, DHParams},
 2060:                    {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey},
 2061:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 2062:                                || Der <- ServerCaCerts]}],
 2063:     ClientOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer},
 2064:                    {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey},
 2065:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 2066:                                || Der <- ClientCaCerts]}],
 2067:     Server1 = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2068:                                          {from, self()},
 2069:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2070:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts1]}]),
 2071:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 2072:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port1},
 2073:                                          {host, Hostname},
 2074:                                          {from, self()},
 2075:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 2076:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts1]}]),
 2077: 
 2078:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, ok, Client1, ok),
 2079:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
 2080:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
 2081:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 2082:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 2083: 
 2084:     ok.
 2085: 
 2086: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2087: invalid_certfile() ->
 2088:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cert file"}].
 2089: 
 2090: invalid_certfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2091:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2092:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2093:     BadCertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 2094:                                  "badcert.pem"]),
 2095:     ServerBadOpts = [{certfile, BadCertFile}| proplists:delete(certfile, ServerOpts)],
 2096:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2097: 
 2098: 
 2099:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2100:     
 2101:     Server = 
 2102: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2103: 					 {from, self()},
 2104: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 2105: 
 2106:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2107: 
 2108:     Client =
 2109: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2110: 					 {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 2111: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2112: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2113:     File = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2114:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,{options, {certfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, 
 2115: 			      Client, {error, closed}).
 2116:     
 2117: 
 2118: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2119: invalid_cacertfile() ->
 2120:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cacert file"}].
 2121: 
 2122: invalid_cacertfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2123:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2124:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2125:     BadCACertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 2126:                                  "badcacert.pem"]),
 2127:     ServerBadOpts = [{cacertfile, BadCACertFile}| proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts)],
 2128:     
 2129:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2130: 
 2131:     Server0  = 
 2132: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2133: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2134: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 2135: 
 2136:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 2137:     
 2138: 
 2139:     Client0 =
 2140: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2141: 					 {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 2142: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2143: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2144: 
 2145:     File0 = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2146:     
 2147:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File0,{error,enoent}}}},
 2148: 			      Client0, {error, closed}),
 2149:     
 2150:     File = File0 ++ "do_not_exit.pem",
 2151:     ServerBadOpts1 = [{cacertfile, File}|proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts)],
 2152:             
 2153:     Server1  = 
 2154: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2155: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2156: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts1}]),
 2157: 
 2158:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 2159:     
 2160:     Client1 =
 2161: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2162: 					 {port, Port1}, {host, Hostname},
 2163: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2164: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2165: 
 2166: 
 2167:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File,{error,enoent}}}},
 2168: 			      Client1, {error, closed}),
 2169:     ok.
 2170: 
 2171: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2172: new_options_in_handshake() ->
 2173:     [{doc,"Test that you can set ssl options in handshake/3 and not only in tcp upgrade"}].
 2174: new_options_in_handshake(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2175:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2176:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2177:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 2178:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2179: 
 2180:     Ciphers = [_, Cipher | _] = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version), 
 2181:                                                          [{key_exchange,
 2182:                                                  fun(dhe_rsa) ->
 2183:                                                          true;
 2184:                                                     (ecdhe_rsa) ->
 2185:                                                          true;
 2186:                                                     (rsa) ->
 2187:                                                          false;
 2188:                                                     (_) ->
 2189:                                                          false
 2190:                                                  end
 2191:                                                 }]),
 2192:     
 2193:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2194: 					{from, self()}, 
 2195: 					{ssl_extra_opts, [{versions, [Version]},
 2196: 							  {ciphers,[Cipher]}]}, %% To be set in handshake/3
 2197: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2198: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 2199:     
 2200:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2201:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 2202: 					{host, Hostname},
 2203: 					{from, self()}, 
 2204: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2205: 					{options, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2206:     
 2207:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 2208: 
 2209:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Cipher}},
 2210:    
 2211:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 2212:     
 2213:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2214:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 2215: 
 2216: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2217: max_handshake_size() ->
 2218:     [{doc,"Test that we can set max_handshake_size to max value."}].
 2219: 
 2220: max_handshake_size(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2221:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2222:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),  
 2223: 
 2224:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2225:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2226: 					{from, self()}, 
 2227: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2228: 					{options,  [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} |ServerOpts]}]),
 2229:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2230:     
 2231:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 2232: 					{host, Hostname},
 2233: 					{from, self()}, 
 2234: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2235: 					{options, [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2236:  
 2237:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 2238:   
 2239: 
 2240: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2241: 
 2242: -define(FUNC_CLAUSE(EXPR), try EXPR, error(should_fail) catch _:function_clause -> ok end).
 2243: 
 2244: options_not_proplist() ->
 2245:     [{doc,"Test what happens if an option is not a key value tuple"}].
 2246: 
 2247: options_not_proplist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2248:     BadOption =  {client_preferred_next_protocols, 
 2249: 		  client, [<<"spdy/3">>,<<"http/1.1">>], <<"http/1.1">>},
 2250:     {error, {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, BadOption}}} =
 2251: 	ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443, [binary, {active, false}, 
 2252: 					 BadOption]),
 2253:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443)),
 2254:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443, infinity)),
 2255:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", [], infinity_misspelled)),
 2256:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:connect("twitter.com", foo, [], infinity)),
 2257:     %% While at it test some other functions as well for regression testing
 2258:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:listen([], 443)),
 2259:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:transport_accept(#sslsocket{}, [])),
 2260:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, [])),
 2261:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(foo, #sslsocket{})),
 2262:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(foo, #sslsocket{}, 1000)),
 2263:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, 1000, 1000)),
 2264:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake(#sslsocket{}, [opt_list], [])),
 2265:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake_continue(socket, [opt_list], [])),
 2266:     ?FUNC_CLAUSE(ssl:handshake_continue(socket, 1000, 1000)),
 2267: 
 2268:     ok.
 2269: 
 2270: options_whitebox() ->
 2271:     [{doc,"Whitebox tests of option handling"}].
 2272: 
 2273: 
 2274: customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host) ->
 2275:     %% In many options test scenarios we do not care about verifcation options
 2276:     %% but the client now requiers verification options by default.
 2277:     DefOpts = case Role of
 2278:                   client ->
 2279:                       case proplists:get_value(verify, Opts, undefined) of
 2280:                           undefined -> [{verify, verify_none}];
 2281:                           _ -> []
 2282:                       end;
 2283:                   server ->
 2284:                       Ciphers = proplists:get_value(ciphers, Opts, undefined),
 2285:                       Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, Opts, undefined),
 2286:                       Key = proplists:get_value(key, Opts, undefined),
 2287:                       CertsKeys = proplists:get_value(certs_keys, Opts, undefined),
 2288:                       NoCertOrKeys = Cert == undefined orelse Key == undefined andalso
 2289:                           CertsKeys == undefined,
 2290:                       if Ciphers == undefined andalso NoCertOrKeys ->
 2291:                               [{certs_keys, [#{cert => <<>>, key => {rsa, <<>>}}]}];
 2292:                          true ->
 2293:                               []
 2294:                       end
 2295:               end,
 2296:     NoVerify = case Role of
 2297:                    client -> [{verify, verify_none}|DefOpts];
 2298:                    server -> DefOpts
 2299:                end,
 2300:     case proplists:get_value(protocol, Opts, tls) of
 2301:         dtls ->
 2302:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options([{protocol, dtls}|NoVerify], Role, Host),
 2303:             {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts};
 2304:         tls ->
 2305:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options(NoVerify, Role, Host),
 2306:             case proplists:get_value(versions, Opts) of
 2307:                 undefined ->
 2308:                     {DOpts, DefOpts ++ [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|Opts]};
 2309:                 _ ->
 2310:                     {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts}
 2311:             end;
 2312:         _ ->
 2313:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options(NoVerify, Role, Host),
 2314:             {DOpts, DefOpts ++ Opts}
 2315:     end.
 2316: 
 2317: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role), ?OK(EXP,Opts, Role, [])).
 2318: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role, ShouldBeMissing),
 2319:         fun() ->
 2320:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2321:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2322:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2323:                     {ok, #config{ssl=EXP = __ALL}} ->
 2324:                         check_expected(ShouldBeMissing, ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL)),
 2325:                         check_expected(__ALL, ssl:update_options([], Role, __ALL));
 2326:                     Other ->
 2327:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2328:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2329:                 catch
 2330:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2331:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2332:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2333:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2334:                 end,
 2335:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2336:                     EXP = __ALL2 ->
 2337:                         check_expected(ShouldBeMissing, ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL2));
 2338:                     Other2 ->
 2339:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2340:                                "ssl:update_options(~w,~w, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2341:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2342:                         error({unexpected2, Other2})
 2343:                 catch
 2344:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2345:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2346:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2347:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2348:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2349:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2, ST2})
 2350:                 end
 2351:         end()).
 2352: 
 2353: -define(ERR(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2354:         fun() ->
 2355:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2356:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2357:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2358:                     Other ->
 2359:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2360:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2361:                 catch
 2362:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2363:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2364:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2365:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2366:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2367:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2368:                 end,
 2369:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2370:                     Other2 ->
 2371:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2372:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2373:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2374:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2375:                 catch
 2376:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2377:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2378:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2379:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2380:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2381:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2382:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2383:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2384:                 end
 2385:         end()).
 2386: 
 2387: -define(ERR_UPD(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2388:         fun() ->
 2389:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2390:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2391:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2392:                     {ok, #config{}} ->
 2393:                         ok;
 2394:                     Other ->
 2395:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2396:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2397:                 catch
 2398:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2399:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2400:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2401:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2402:                 end,
 2403:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2404:                     Other2 ->
 2405:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2406:                                 "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2407:                                 [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2408:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2409:                 catch
 2410:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2411:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2412:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2413:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2414:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2415:                                 "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2416:                                 [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2417:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2418:                 end
 2419:         end()).
 2420: 
 2421: check_expected(A, A) ->
 2422:     ok;
 2423: check_expected(A, B) when is_list(A), is_list(B) ->
 2424:     Diff1 = A -- B,
 2425:     Diff2 = B -- A,
 2426:     ct:log("NOT EQUAL~n ~p~n ~p~n", [A,B]),
 2427:     if Diff1 =/= [], Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2428:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1, Diff2});
 2429:        Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2430:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff2});
 2431:        true ->
 2432:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1})
 2433:     end;
 2434: check_expected(A, B) when is_map(A), is_map(B) ->
 2435:     Diff1 = [{KeyA, ValA}
 2436:              || KeyA := ValA <- A, ValA =/= maps:get(KeyA, B, missing_key_val)],
 2437:     Diff2 = [{KeyB, ValB}
 2438:              || KeyB := ValB <- B, ValB =/= maps:get(KeyB, A, missing_key_val)],
 2439:     ct:log("NOT EQUAL~n ~p~n ~p~n", [A,B]),
 2440:     if Diff1 =/= [], Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2441:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1, Diff2});
 2442:        Diff2 =/= [] ->
 2443:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff2});
 2444:        true ->
 2445:             ct:fail({not_equal, {line, ?LINE}, Diff1})
 2446:     end;
 2447: check_expected({ok, Term1}, {ok, Term2}) ->
 2448:     check_expected(Term1, Term2);
 2449: check_expected(A, B) ->
 2450:     ct:log("NOT EQUAL~n ~p~n~p~n", [A,B]),
 2451:     ct:fail(not_equal).
 2452: 
 2453: 
 2454: options_whitebox(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2455:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2456:     true = is_binary(Cert),
 2457:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_peer},  %% Check Option order last wins
 2458:         [{verify, verify_none}, {verify,verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client),
 2459:     options_protocol(Config),
 2460:     options_version(Config),
 2461:     options_alpn(Config),
 2462:     options_anti_replay(Config),
 2463:     options_beast_mitigation(Config),
 2464:     options_cacerts(Config),
 2465:     options_cert(Config),
 2466:     options_certificate_authorities(Config),
 2467:     options_ciphers(Config),
 2468:     options_client_renegotiation(Config),
 2469:     options_cookie(Config),
 2470:     options_crl(Config),
 2471:     options_hostname_check(Config),
 2472:     options_dh(Config),
 2473:     options_early_data(Config),
 2474:     options_eccs(Config),
 2475:     options_verify(Config),
 2476:     options_fallback(Config),
 2477:     options_handshake(Config),
 2478:     options_process(Config),
 2479:     options_honor(Config),
 2480:     options_debug(Config),
 2481:     options_renegotiate(Config),
 2482:     options_middlebox(Config),
 2483:     options_frag_len(Config),
 2484:     options_stapling(Config),
 2485:     options_padding(Config),
 2486:     options_identity(Config),
 2487:     options_reuse_session(Config),
 2488:     options_sni(Config),
 2489:     options_sign_alg(Config),
 2490:     options_supported_groups(Config),
 2491:     options_use_srtp(Config),
 2492:     ok.
 2493: 
 2494: options_protocol(_Config) ->
 2495:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [], client),
 2496:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [{protocol, tls}], client),
 2497:     ?OK(#{protocol := dtls}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2498: 
 2499:     %% Errors
 2500:     ?ERR({protocol, foo}, [{protocol, 'foo'}], client),
 2501: 
 2502:     begin %% erl_dist
 2503:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [erl_dist]),
 2504:         ?OK(#{}, [{erl_dist, false}], client, [erl_dist]),
 2505:         ?OK(#{erl_dist := true}, [{erl_dist, true}], client),
 2506:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [ktls]),
 2507:         ?OK(#{}, [{ktls, false}], client, [ktls]),
 2508:         ?OK(#{ktls := true}, [{ktls, true}], client)
 2509:     end,
 2510:     ok.
 2511: 
 2512: options_version(_Config) ->
 2513:     ?OK(#{versions := [_|_]}, [], client),  %% Hmm some machines still default only ?TLS_1_2
 2514:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2515: 
 2516:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3,?TLS_1_2,?TLS_1_1,?TLS_1_0]},
 2517:         [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2518:         client),
 2519:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3]}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 2520: 
 2521:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2,?DTLS_1_0]},
 2522:         [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}],  client),
 2523:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2524: 
 2525: 
 2526:     %% Errors
 2527:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{versions, []}], client),
 2528:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, []}], client),
 2529: 
 2530:     ?ERR({'tlsv1.4',{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}},
 2531:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}], client),
 2532:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2533:          [{versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2534: 
 2535:     ?ERR({'tlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2536:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2537:          client),
 2538:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1.3',{versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}},
 2539:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}],
 2540:          client),
 2541:     ?ERR({options,missing_version,{'tlsv1.2',_}},
 2542:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}],
 2543:          client),
 2544:     ok.
 2545: 
 2546: options_alpn(_Config) -> %% alpn & next_protocols
 2547:     Http = <<"HTTP/2">>,
 2548:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined}, [], client,
 2549:         [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2550:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined},  [], server,
 2551:         [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2552: 
 2553:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}],
 2554:         server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2555:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}],
 2556:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2557: 
 2558:     %% Note names have been swapped in client/server variants
 2559: 
 2560:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined, next_protocols_advertised := [Http]},
 2561:         [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector]),
 2562:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined, next_protocol_selector := _},
 2563:         [{client_preferred_next_protocols, {server,[Http], Http}}],
 2564:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2565: 
 2566:     %% Errors
 2567:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http, <<>>]}], server),
 2568:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}], client),
 2569:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}], server),
 2570:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}], client),
 2571:     ?ERR({option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}], client),
 2572:     ?ERR({option, client_only, alpn_advertised_protocols}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2573:     ?ERR({option, server_only, next_protocols_advertised}, [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], client),
 2574:     ?ERR({option, client_only, client_preferred_next_protocols}, [{client_preferred_next_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2575:     ok.
 2576: 
 2577: options_anti_replay(_Config) ->
 2578:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := undefined}, [], server),
 2579:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2580:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2581:         server),
 2582:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2583:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2584:         server),
 2585:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2586:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2587:         server),
 2588:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2589:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2590:         server),
 2591: 
 2592: 
 2593:     %% Errors
 2594:     ?ERR({option, server_only, anti_replay},
 2595:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, manual}],
 2596:          client),
 2597:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{anti_replay, _}, {session_tickets, disabled}]},
 2598:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}],
 2599:          server),
 2600:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2601:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2602:          server),
 2603:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2604:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2605:          server),
 2606:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2607:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2608:          server),
 2609:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2610:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2611:          server),
 2612:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2613:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2614:          server),
 2615:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2616:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2617:          server),
 2618:     ok.
 2619: 
 2620: options_beast_mitigation(_Config) -> %% Beast mitigation TLS-1.0 option only
 2621:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := one_n_minus_one}, [{versions, [tlsv1,'tlsv1.1']}], client),
 2622: 
 2623:     ?OK(#{}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']}], client, [beast_mitigation]),
 2624:     ?OK(#{}, [{beast_mitigation, disabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2625:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := zero_n}, [{beast_mitigation, zero_n}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2626: 
 2627:     %% Errors
 2628:     ?ERR({beast_mitigation, enabled},
 2629:          [{beast_mitigation, enabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2630:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [beast_mitigation, {versions, _}]},
 2631:          [{beast_mitigation, disabled}], client),
 2632:     ok.
 2633: 
 2634: options_cacerts(Config) ->  %% cacert[s]file
 2635:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2636:     File = case os:type() of
 2637:                {win32, _} -> <<"c:/tmp/foo">>;
 2638:                _ -> <<"/tmp/foo">>
 2639:            end,
 2640:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined}, [], client, [cacertfile]),
 2641:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined, cacertfile := File},
 2642:         [{cacertfile, File}], client),
 2643:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {verify, verify_peer}],
 2644:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2645:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [#cert{}]}, [{cacerts, [#cert{der=Cert, otp=dummy}]}],
 2646:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2647:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {cacertfile, "/tmp/foo"}],
 2648:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2649: 
 2650:     %% Errors
 2651:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2652:     ?ERR({cacerts, Cert}, [{cacerts, Cert}], client),
 2653:     ?ERR({cacertfile, cert}, [{cacertfile, cert}], client),
 2654: 
 2655:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [depth]),
 2656:     ?OK(#{depth := 5}, [{depth, 5}], client),
 2657:     %% Error
 2658:     ?ERR({depth, 256}, [{depth, 256}], client),
 2659:     ?ERR({depth, not_an_int}, [{depth, not_an_int}], client),
 2660:     ok.
 2661: 
 2662: options_cert(Config) -> %% cert[file] cert_keys keys password
 2663:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2664:     Old = [cert, certfile, key, keyfile, password],
 2665:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []}, [], client, Old),
 2666:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,Cert}], client, Old),
 2667:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,[Cert]}], client, Old),
 2668:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>}]},
 2669:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], client, Old),
 2670: 
 2671:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []}, [{certs_keys, [#{}]}], client),
 2672: 
 2673:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := {rsa, <<>>}}]},
 2674:         [{key, {rsa, <<>>}}], client, Old),
 2675:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2676:         [{key, #{engine => foo, algorithm => foo, key_id => foo}}], client, Old),
 2677:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2678:         [{key, #{algorithm => eddsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}},
 2679:          {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client, Old),
 2680:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2681:         [{key, #{algorithm => ecdsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}}],
 2682:         client, Old),
 2683:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2684:         [{key, #{algorithm => rsa,
 2685:                   sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end,
 2686:                  encrypt_fun => fun(_,_,_) -> << "dummy encrypt">> end}},
 2687:          {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}], client, Old),
 2688:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, "foobar"}], client, Old),
 2689:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, <<"foobar">>}], client, Old),
 2690:     Pwd = fun() -> "foobar" end,
 2691:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := Pwd}]}, [{password, Pwd}], client, Old),
 2692: 
 2693:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/baz">>}]},
 2694:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {keyfile, "/tmp/baz"}], client, Old),
 2695: 
 2696:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []},
 2697:         [{cert, Cert}, {certfile, "/tmp/foo"}, {certs_keys, [#{}]}],
 2698:         client, Old),
 2699: 
 2700:     %% Errors
 2701:     ?ERR({options,incompatible,[key,{versions,['tlsv1.2']}]},
 2702:          [{key, #{algorithm => eddsa, sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end}},
 2703:           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], client),
 2704:     ?ERR({options,incompatible,[key,{versions,['tlsv1.3','tlsv1.2']}]},
 2705:          [{key, #{algorithm => rsa,
 2706:                   sign_fun => fun(_,_,_,_) -> << "dummy signature">> end,
 2707:                   encrypt_fun => fun(_,_,_) -> << "dummy encrypt">> end
 2708:                  }}], client),
 2709:     ?ERR({cert, #{}}, [{cert, #{}}], client),
 2710:     ?ERR({certfile, cert}, [{certfile, cert}], client),
 2711:     ?ERR({certs_keys, #{}}, [{certs_keys, #{}}], client),
 2712:     ?ERR_UPD({certs_keys, cert_and_key_required}, [{certs_keys, []}], server),
 2713:     ?ERR({keyfile, #{}}, [{keyfile, #{}}], client),
 2714:     ?ERR({key, <<>>}, [{key, <<>>}], client),
 2715:     ?ERR({password, _}, [{password, fun(Arg) -> Arg end}], client),
 2716:     ok.
 2717: 
 2718: options_certificate_authorities(_Config) ->
 2719:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [certificate_authorities]),
 2720:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [certificate_authorities]),
 2721:     ?OK(#{certificate_authorities := true}, [{certificate_authorities, true}], client),
 2722:     ?OK(#{}, [{certificate_authorities, false}], client, [certificate_authorities]),
 2723:     ?OK(#{certificate_authorities := false}, [{certificate_authorities, false}], server),
 2724:     ?OK(#{}, [{certificate_authorities, true}], server, [certificate_authorities]),
 2725: 
 2726:     %% Errors
 2727:     ?ERR({certificate_authorities, []},
 2728:          [{certificate_authorities,  []}], client),
 2729:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [certificate_authorities, {versions, _}]},
 2730:          [{certificate_authorities, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}],
 2731:          client),
 2732:     ok.
 2733: 
 2734: options_ciphers(_Config) ->
 2735:     CipherSuite = ssl_test_lib:ecdh_dh_anonymous_suites(?TLS_1_2),
 2736:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [], client),
 2737:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, CipherSuite}], client),
 2738:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"}], client),
 2739:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, ["RC4-SHA", "RC4-MD5"]}], client),
 2740: 
 2741:     ?OK(#{ciphers := [_|_]}, [{ciphers, ["TLS_DH_anon_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA256"]}], server),
 2742:     %% Errors
 2743:     ?ERR({ciphers, _}, [{ciphers, "foobar:RC4-MD5"}], client),
 2744:     ?ERR({ciphers, _}, [{ciphers, ["RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5", "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"]}], client),
 2745:     ?ERR_UPD({certs_keys, cert_and_key_required}, [{ciphers, "RC4-SHA:RC4-MD5"}], server),
 2746:     ok.
 2747: 
 2748: options_client_renegotiation(_Config) ->
 2749:     ?OK(#{client_renegotiation := true}, [], server),
 2750:     ?OK(#{client_renegotiation := false}, [{client_renegotiation, false}], server),
 2751: 
 2752:     %% Errors
 2753:     ?ERR({client_renegotiation, []}, [{client_renegotiation,  []}], server),
 2754:     ?ERR({option, server_only, client_renegotiation}, [{client_renegotiation, true}], client),
 2755:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [client_renegotiation, {versions, _}]},
 2756:          [{client_renegotiation, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 2757:          server),
 2758:     ok.
 2759: 
 2760: 
 2761: options_cookie(_Config) ->
 2762:     ?OK(#{cookie := true},  [], server),
 2763:     ?OK(#{cookie := false}, [{cookie, false}], server),
 2764: 
 2765:     %% Errors
 2766:     ?ERR({cookie, []}, [{cookie,  []}], server),
 2767:     ?ERR({option, server_only, cookie}, [{cookie, true}], client),
 2768:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [cookie, {versions, _}]},
 2769:          [{cookie, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2770:     ok.
 2771: 
 2772: options_crl(_Config) ->
 2773:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, _}, crl_check := false}, [], server),
 2774:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, _}, crl_check := true},  [{crl_check, true}], server),
 2775:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_hash_dir, {_,_}}, crl_check := true},
 2776:         [{crl_check, true}, {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_hash_dir, {internal, [{dir, "/tmp"}]}}}],
 2777:         server),
 2778:     ?OK(#{crl_cache := {ssl_crl_cache, {_,_}}, crl_check := true},
 2779:         [{crl_check, true}, {crl_cache, {ssl_crl_cache, {internal, [{http, 5000}]}}}],
 2780:         server),
 2781:     %% Errors
 2782:     ?ERR({crl_check, foo}, [{crl_check, foo}], server),
 2783:     ?ERR({crl_cache, {a,b,c}}, [{crl_cache, {a,b,c}}], server),
 2784:     ok.
 2785: 
 2786: options_hostname_check(_Config) ->
 2787:     ?OK(#{customize_hostname_check := []}, [], client),
 2788:     ?OK(#{customize_hostname_check := [{match_fun, _}]},
 2789:         [{customize_hostname_check, [{match_fun, fun() -> ok end}]}],
 2790:         client),
 2791:     %% Error
 2792:     ?ERR({customize_hostname_check, _}, [{customize_hostname_check, {match_fun, pb_fun}}], client),
 2793:     ok.
 2794: 
 2795: options_dh(_Config) -> %% dh dhfile
 2796:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [dh, dhfile]),
 2797:     ?OK(#{dh := <<>>}, [{dh, <<>>}], server, [dhfile]),
 2798:     ?OK(#{dhfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>}, [{dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], server, [dh]),
 2799:     ?OK(#{dh := <<>>}, [{dh, <<>>}, {dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], server, [dhfile]),
 2800: 
 2801:     %% Should be an error
 2802:     ?OK(#{dhfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>},  %% Not available in 1.3
 2803:         [{dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], server, [dh]),
 2804: 
 2805:     %% Error
 2806:     ?ERR({dh, not_a_bin}, [{dh, not_a_bin}], server),
 2807:     ?ERR({dhfile, not_a_filename}, [{dhfile, not_a_filename}], server),
 2808:     ?ERR({option, server_only, dhfile}, [{dhfile, "file"}], client),
 2809:     ?ERR({option, server_only, dh}, [{dh, <<"DER">>}], client),
 2810:     ok.
 2811: 
 2812: options_early_data(_Config) -> %% early_data, session_tickets and use_ticket
 2813:     ?OK(#{early_data := undefined, session_tickets := disabled},
 2814:         [], client),
 2815:     ?OK(#{early_data := disabled, session_tickets := disabled, stateless_tickets_seed := undefined},
 2816:         [], server),
 2817: 
 2818:     ?OK(#{early_data := <<>>, session_tickets := auto},
 2819:         [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, auto}], client),
 2820:     ?OK(#{early_data := <<>>, session_tickets := manual, use_ticket := [<<1>>]},
 2821:         [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, manual}, {use_ticket, [<<1>>]}],
 2822:         client),
 2823: 
 2824:     ?OK(#{early_data := enabled, stateless_tickets_seed := <<"foo">>},
 2825:         [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], server),
 2826:     ?OK(#{early_data := enabled, stateless_tickets_seed := <<"foo">>},
 2827:         [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], server),
 2828: 
 2829:     ?OK(#{early_data := disabled}, [{early_data, disabled}], server),
 2830: 
 2831:     %% Errors
 2832:     ?ERR({option, client_only, use_ticket}, [{use_ticket, []}], server),
 2833:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{use_ticket, [<<>>]}], client),
 2834: 
 2835:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, foo}}, [{session_tickets, foo}], server),
 2836:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, manual}}, [{session_tickets, manual}], server),
 2837:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, stateful}}, [{session_tickets, stateful}], client),
 2838:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [session_tickets, {versions, _}]},
 2839:          [{session_tickets, stateful}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2840:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [session_tickets, {versions, _}]},
 2841:          [{session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2842: 
 2843:     ?ERR({use_ticket, foo},
 2844:          [{use_ticket, foo}, {session_tickets, manual}], client),
 2845: 
 2846:     ?ERR({early_data,undefined}, [{early_data, undefined}], client),
 2847:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, {session_tickets, _}]},
 2848:          [{early_data, <<>>}], client),
 2849:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, enabled}},
 2850:          [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, auto}], client),
 2851:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, _, {use_ticket, _}]},
 2852:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, manual}], client),
 2853: 
 2854:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, {session_tickets, _}]},
 2855:          [{early_data, enabled}], server),
 2856:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, <<>>}},
 2857:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless}], server),
 2858:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, <<>>}},
 2859:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}], server),
 2860: 
 2861:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful}]},
 2862:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}, {session_tickets, stateful}],
 2863:          server),
 2864:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}]},
 2865:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}, {session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}],
 2866:          server),
 2867:     ?ERR({stateless_tickets_seed, foo},
 2868:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, foo}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2869:          server),
 2870:     ?ERR({stateless_tickets_seed, foo},
 2871:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, foo}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2872:          server),
 2873:     ?ERR({option, server_only, stateless_tickets_seed},
 2874:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], client),
 2875:     ok.

 2877: options_eccs(_Config) ->
 2878:     Curves = tl(ssl:eccs()),
 2879:     ?OK(#{eccs := {elliptic_curves, [_|_]}}, [], client),
 2880:     ?OK(#{eccs := {elliptic_curves, [_|_]}}, [{eccs, Curves}], client),
 2881: 
 2882:     %% Errors
 2883:     ?ERR({eccs, not_a_list}, [{eccs, not_a_list}], client),
 2884:     ?ERR({eccs, none_valid}, [{eccs, []}], client),
 2885:     ?ERR({options,{eccs,[foo]}}, [{eccs, [foo]}], client),
 2886:     ok.

 2888: options_verify(Config) ->  %% fail_if_no_peer_cert, verify, verify_fun, partial_chain
 2889:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2890:     {ok, #config{ssl = DefOpts = #{verify_fun := {DefVerify,_}}}} = ssl:handle_options([{verify, verify_none}], client, "dummy.host.org"),
 2891: 
 2892:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := false, verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {DefVerify, []}, partial_chain := _},
 2893:         [], server),
 2894:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2895:         [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2896:         server),
 2897:      ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2898:          [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], server),
 2899: 
 2900:     %% Test ssl option handling. Option values are verified by public_key tests
 2901:     CertPolicyOpts = [{policy_set, [?anyPolicy]}, {explicit_policy, false}],
 2902: 
 2903:     ?OK(#{cert_policy_opts := CertPolicyOpts}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, CertPolicyOpts}],
 2904:         client),
 2905: 
 2906:     NewF3 = fun(_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2907:     NewF4 = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2908:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [fail_if_no_peer_cert]),
 2909:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2910:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}], client),
 2911:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2912:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2913:         server),
 2914:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF4, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2915:         [{verify_fun, {NewF4, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2916:         server),
 2917: 
 2918: 
 2919:     %% check verify_fun in update_options case
 2920:     #{verify_fun := undefined} = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client, DefOpts),
 2921:     #{verify_fun := {NewF3, bar}} = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]},
 2922:                                                         {verify_fun, {NewF3, bar}}],
 2923:                                                        client, DefOpts),
 2924: 
 2925:     %% Errors
 2926:     ?ERR({partial_chain, undefined}, [{partial_chain, undefined}], client),
 2927:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, verify_none}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}]},
 2928:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}], server),
 2929:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], client),
 2930:     ?ERR({option, server_only, fail_if_no_peer_cert},
 2931:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2932:          client),
 2933:     ?ERR({verify, verify}, [{verify, verify}], client),
 2934:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2935:     ?ERR({partial_chain, not_a_fun}, [{partial_chain, not_a_fun}], client),
 2936:     ?ERR({verify_fun, not_a_fun}, [{verify_fun, not_a_fun}], client),
 2937:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {foo, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{foo,bar}]}],
 2938:         client),
 2939:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {explicit_policy, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{explicit_policy,bar}]}],
 2940:          client),
 2941:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {inhibit_policy_mapping, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{explicit_policy, true},
 2942:                                                                                                                            {inhibit_policy_mapping,bar}]}],
 2943:          client),
 2944:     ?ERR({cert_policy_opts, {inhibit_any_policy, bar}}, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}, {cert_policy_opts, [{inhibit_any_policy,bar}]}],
 2945:          client),
 2946:     ok.

 2954:     ?ERR({fallback, []},  [{fallback, []}], client),
 2955:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [fallback, {versions, _}]},
 2956:          [{fallback, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 2957:     ok.

 3098:          [{srp_identity, {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}}], client),
 3099:     ?ERR({psk_identity, _},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 3100:          [{psk_identity, <<"user">>}], client),

 3104:          client),

 3216: options_use_srtp(_Config) ->
 3217:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3218:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3219:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3220:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3221:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3222:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3223:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3224:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3225:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], client),
 3226:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3227:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3228:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], server),
 3229: 
 3230:     %% invalid parameters
 3231:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3232:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3233:           {use_srtp, #{}}], client),
 3234:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3235:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3236:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => []}}], client),
 3237:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {invalid_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3238:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3239:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<"bad">>]}}], client),
 3240:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {unknown_parameters,[whatever]}}},
 3241:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3242:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], whatever => xxx}}], client),
 3243: 
 3244:     %% use_srtp is DTLS-only extension, by default setting its options should raise an error
 3245:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3246:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3247:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3248:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3249:     ok.
 3250: 
 3251: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3252: 
 3253: default_reject_anonymous()->
 3254:     [{doc,"Test that by default anonymous cipher suites are rejected "}].
 3255: default_reject_anonymous(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3256:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3257:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3258:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3259:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 3260:     TLSVersion = ssl_test_lib:tls_version(Version),
 3261:     
 3262:    [CipherSuite | _] = ssl_test_lib:ecdh_dh_anonymous_suites(TLSVersion),
 3263:     
 3264:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3265: 					      {from, self()},
 3266: 					      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3267:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3268:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3269:                                               {host, Hostname},
 3270:                                               {from, self()},
 3271:                                               {options,
 3272:                                                [{ciphers,[CipherSuite]} |
 3273:                                                 ClientOpts]}]),
 3274: 
 3275:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
 3276: 
 3277: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3278: cb_info() ->
 3279:     [{doc,"Test that we can set cb_info."}].
 3280: 
 3281: cb_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3282:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3283:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3284:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3285:     CbInfo =
 3286:         case Protocol of
 3287:             tls ->
 3288:                 {cb_info, {gen_tcp, tcp, tcp_closed, tcp_error}};
 3289:             dtls ->
 3290:                 {cb_info, {gen_udp, udp, udp_closed, udp_error}}
 3291:         end,
 3292:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3293:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3294:                                         {from, self()},
 3295:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3296:                                         {options,  [CbInfo | ServerOpts]}]),
 3297:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3298: 
 3299:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3300:                                         {host, Hostname},
 3301:                                         {from, self()},
 3302:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3303:                                         {options, [CbInfo | ClientOpts]}]),
 3304: 
 3305:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3306: 
 3307: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3308: log_alert() ->
 3309:     [{doc,"Test that we can set log_alert and that it translates to correct log_level" 
 3310:       " that has replaced this option"}].
 3311: 
 3312: log_alert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3313:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3314:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3315: 
 3316:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3317:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3318:                                         {from, self()},
 3319:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3320:                                         {options,  [{log_alert, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3321:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3322:     {Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 3323:                                                  {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3324:                                                  {host, Hostname},
 3325:                                                  {from, self()},
 3326:                                                  {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3327:                                                  {options, [{log_alert, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3328:     
 3329:     {ok, [{log_level, none}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [log_level]),
 3330:     
 3331:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3332: 
 3333: 
 3334: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3335: %% Note that these test only test that the options are valid to set. As application data
 3336: %% is a stream you can not test that the send acctually splits it up as when it arrives
 3337: %% again at the user layer it may be concatenated. But COVER can show that the split up
 3338: %% code has been run.
 3339:    
 3340: rizzo_disabled() ->
 3341:      [{doc, "Test original beast mitigation disable option for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3342: 
 3343: rizzo_disabled(Config) ->
 3344:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3345:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3346:     
 3347:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3348: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3349: rizzo_zero_n() ->
 3350:      [{doc, "Test zero_n beast mitigation option (same affect as original disable option) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3351: 
 3352: rizzo_zero_n(Config) ->
 3353:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3354:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3355:     
 3356:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3357: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3358: rizzo_one_n_minus_one () ->
 3359:      [{doc, "Test beast_mitigation option one_n_minus_one (same affect as default) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3360: 
 3361: rizzo_one_n_minus_one (Config) ->
 3362:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one } | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3363:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3364:     
 3365:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3366:

 3369: supported_groups() ->
 3370:     [{doc,"Test the supported_groups option in TLS 1.3."}].
 3371: 
 3372: supported_groups(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3373:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3374:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3375: 
 3376:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3377: 
 3378:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3379: 					{from, self()},
 3380:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3381:                                         {options, [{supported_groups, [x448, x25519]} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3382:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3383:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3384: 					{host, Hostname},
 3385:                                         {from, self()},
 3386:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3387:                                         {options, [{supported_groups,[x448]} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3388: 
 3389:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 3390: 
 3391:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3392:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 3393:

 3395: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3396:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3397: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3398:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3399:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3400:                        mac => aead,
 3401:                        prf => sha384},
 3402:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3403:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3404:                        mac => aead,
 3405:                        prf => sha256}],
 3406:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3407:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3408:                        mac => aead,
 3409:                        prf => sha256},
 3410:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3411:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3412:                        mac => aead,
 3413:                        prf => sha384}],
 3414:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3415:                                                                       cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3416:                                                                       mac => aead,
 3417:                                                                       prf => sha384}).

 3424:                           {options, missing_version, 
 3425:                            {'tlsv1.2', {versions,[tlsv1, 'tlsv1.3']}}}).

 3434:                            [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}]}).

 3459:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3460:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3461:                           {options,incompatible,
 3462:                            [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1.2']}]}),
 3463:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3464:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3465:                           {options,incompatible,
 3466:                            [early_data,{session_tickets,disabled}]}),
 3467: 
 3468:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3469:                                    {session_tickets, stateful},
 3470:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3471:                           {options, {session_tickets, stateful}}),
 3472: 
 3473:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3474:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3475:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3476:                           {options,incompatible,
 3477:                            [early_data, {session_tickets, manual}, {use_ticket, undefined}]}),
 3478:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3479:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3480:                                    {use_ticket, [<<"ticket">>]},
 3481:                                    {early_data, "test"}],
 3482:                           {options, {early_data, "test"}}),
 3483:     %% All options are ok but there is no server
 3484:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3485:                                    {session_tickets, manual},
 3486:                                    {use_ticket, [<<"ticket">>]},
 3487:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3488:                           econnrefused),
 3489: 
 3490:     %% All options are ok but there is no server
 3491:     start_client_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3492:                                    {session_tickets, auto},
 3493:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
 3494:                           econnrefused).

 3544:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, Seed}],

 3552:                            [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, disabled}]}),

 3555:                                    {session_tickets, stateful},
 3556:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, Seed}],
 3557:                           {options, incompatible,
 3558:                            [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful}]}),
 3559: 
 3560:     InvalidSeed1 = 12345,
 3561:     start_server_negative(Config, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
 3562:                                    {session_tickets, stateless},
 3563:                                    {stateless_tickets_seed, InvalidSeed1}],
 3564:                           {options, {stateless_tickets_seed, InvalidSeed1}}).
