 3567: honor_server_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3568:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3569: honor_server_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3570:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3571:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3572:                        mac => aead,
 3573:                        prf => sha384},
 3574:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3575:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3576:                        mac => aead,
 3577:                        prf => sha256}],
 3578:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3579:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3580:                        mac => aead,
 3581:                        prf => sha256},
 3582:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3583:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3584:                        mac => aead,
 3585:                        prf => sha384}],
 3586:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 3587:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3588:                                         cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3589:                                         mac => aead,
 3590:                                         prf => sha256}).
 3591: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3592: getstat() ->
 3593:     [{doc, "Test that you use ssl:getstat on a TLS socket"}].
 3594: 
 3595: getstat(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 3596:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3597:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3598:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3599:     
 3600:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 3601:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(Port0, [ServerOpts]),
 3602:     {ok, _} = ssl:getstat(ListenSocket),
 3603:     ssl:close(ListenSocket),
 3604: 
 3605:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
 3606: 					{from, self()},
 3607:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3608:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3609:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3610:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
 3611: 					{host, Hostname},
 3612:                                         {from, self()},
 3613:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3614:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3615:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3616: 
 3617: invalid_options_tls13() ->
 3618:     [{doc, "Test invalid options with TLS 1.3"}].
 3619: invalid_options_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3620:     TestOpts =
 3621:         [{{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one},
 3622:           {options, incompatible,
 3623:            [beast_mitigation,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3624:           common},
 3625: 
 3626:          {{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"http/1.1">>]},
 3627:           {options, incompatible,
 3628:            [next_protocols_advertised, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3629:           server},
 3630: 
 3631:          {{client_preferred_next_protocols,
 3632:            {client, [<<"http/1.1">>]}},
 3633:           {options, incompatible,
 3634:            [client_preferred_next_protocols, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3635:           client},
 3636: 
 3637:          {{client_renegotiation, false},
 3638:           {options, incompatible,
 3639:            [client_renegotiation, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3640:           server
 3641:          },
 3642: 
 3643:          {{cookie, false},
 3644:           {option , server_only, cookie},
 3645:           client
 3646:          },
 3647: 
 3648:          {{padding_check, false},
 3649:           {options, incompatible, [padding_check,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3650:           common},
 3651: 
 3652:          {{psk_identity, "Test-User"},
 3653:           {options, incompatible, [psk_identity,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3654:           common},
 3655: 
 3656:          {{user_lookup_fun,
 3657:            {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, <<1,2,3>>}},
 3658:           {options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3659:           common},
 3660: 
 3661:          {{reuse_session, fun(_,_,_,_) -> false end},
 3662:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3663:           server},
 3664: 
 3665:          {{reuse_session, <<1,2,3,4>>},
 3666:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3667:           client},
 3668: 
 3669:          {{reuse_sessions, true},
 3670:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_sessions, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3671:           common},
 3672: 
 3673:          {{secure_renegotiate, false},
 3674:           {options, incompatible, [secure_renegotiate, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3675:           common},
 3676: 
 3677:          {{srp_identity, {"user", "passwd"}},
 3678:           {options, incompatible, [srp_identity, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3679:           client}
 3680:         ],
 3681: 
 3682:     Fun = fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) ->
 3683:                   case Type of
 3684:                       server ->
 3685:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3686:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3687:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3688:                       client ->
 3689:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3690:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3691:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3692:                       common ->
 3693:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3694:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3695:                                                 ErrorMsg),
 3696:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3697:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3698:                                                 ErrorMsg)
 3699:                   end
 3700:           end,
 3701:     [Fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) || {Option, ErrorMsg, Type} <- TestOpts].
 3702: 
 3703: 
 3704: ssl_not_started() ->
 3705:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned if ssl is not started"}].
 3706: ssl_not_started(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3707:     application:stop(ssl),
 3708:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3709:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 3710:     Opts = [{verify, verify_none},
 3711:             {versions, [Version]},
 3712:             {protocol, Protocol}],
 3713:     try
 3714:         {error, ssl_not_started} = ssl:connect("localhost", 22, Opts)
 3715:     after
 3716:         ssl:start()
 3717:     end,
 3718:     ok.
 3719: 
 3720: cookie() ->
 3721:     [{doc, "Test cookie extension in TLS 1.3"}].
 3722: cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3723:     cookie_extension(Config, true),
 3724:     cookie_extension(Config, false).
 3725: 
 3726: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3727: check_random_nonce() ->
 3728:     [{doc,"Test random nonce - expecting 32B random for TLS1.3 and 4B UTC "
 3729:       "epoch with 28B random for older version"}].
 3730: check_random_nonce(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3731:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3732:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3733:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3734:     N = 10,
 3735:     F = fun (Id) -> establish_connection(Id,ServerNode, ServerOpts,
 3736:                                          ClientNode, ClientOpts,
 3737:                                          Hostname)
 3738:         end,
 3739:     ConnectionPairs = [F(Id) || Id <- lists:seq(1, N)],
 3740:     Randoms = lists:flatten([ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server, Client]) ||
 3741:                                 {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs]),
 3742:     Deltas = [abs(FourBytes - SecsSince) ||
 3743:                  {_FromPid,
 3744:                   {_Id, {_, <<FourBytes:32, _/binary>>}, SecsSince}} <- Randoms],
 3745:     MeanDelta = lists:sum(Deltas) div N,
 3746:     case ?config(version, Config) of
 3747:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3748:             %% 4B "random" expected since TLS1.3
 3749:             RndThreshold   = 10000,
 3750:             true = MeanDelta > RndThreshold;
 3751:         _ ->
 3752:             %% 4 epoch based bytes expected pre TLS1.3
 3753:             EpochThreshold = 10,
 3754:             true = MeanDelta < EpochThreshold
 3755:     end,
 3756:     [begin
 3757:          ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3758:          ssl_test_lib:close(Client)
 3759:      end || {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs].
 3760: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3761: cipher_listing() ->
 3762:     [{doc, "Check that exclusive cipher for possible supported version adds up to all cipher " 
 3763:       "for the max version. Note that TLS-1.3 will contain two distinct sets of ciphers "
 3764:       "one for TLS-1.3 and one pre TLS-1.3"}].
 3765: cipher_listing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3766:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 3767:     length_exclusive(Version) == length_all(Version).
 3768: 
 3769: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3770: format_error() ->
 3771:     "".
 3772: format_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3773:     Errors = [{error, enotconn},
 3774:               {error, closed},
 3775:               {options, {keyfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3776:               {options, {certfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3777:               {options, {cacertfile, "TestFileName",{error,enoent}}},
 3778:               {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, [foo]}},
 3779:               {options, {insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3','tlsv1.1'}}},
 3780:               {options, incompatible, [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]},
 3781:               {options, {protocol, foo}},
 3782:               {option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols},
 3783:               {options, {alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}},
 3784:               {options, missing_version, {'tlsv1.2',{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}}},
 3785:               {options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3786:               {options, {no_supported_signature_schemes, {signature_algs_cert,[]}}}
 3787:              ],
 3788:     Check = fun(Err) ->
 3789:                     Str = ssl:format_error(Err),
 3790:                     io:format("~p => ~s ~n", [Err, Str]),
 3791:                     %% Verify flat string (why do ssl flatten strings?)
 3792:                     Str = [C || C <- Str, is_integer(C)]
 3793:             end,
 3794:     [Check(Err) || Err <- Errors],
 3795:     ok.
 3796: 
 3797: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3798: 
 3799: export_key_materials() ->
 3800:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5"}].
 3801: 
 3802: export_key_materials(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3803:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3804:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3805:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3806:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3807:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3808: 
 3809:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3810: 
 3811:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3812:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3813:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3814:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3815:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3816:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3817:     Server ! get_socket,
 3818:     ServerS = receive
 3819:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3820:               end,
 3821: 
 3822:     case Version of
 3823:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3824:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3825:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3826:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [32]),
 3827:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [32]);
 3828:         _ ->
 3829:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3830:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3831:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3832:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3833:             true = ExportKeyMaterial1 =/= ExportKeyMaterial2
 3834:     end.
 3835: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3836: exporter_master_secret_consumed() ->
 3837:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5 TLS-1.3 functionality"}].
 3838: 
 3839: exporter_master_secret_consumed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3840:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3841:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3842:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3843:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3844:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3845: 
 3846:     Label1 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp1">>,
 3847:     Label2 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp2">>,
 3848:     Label3 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp3">>,
 3849:     Label4 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp4">>,
 3850: 
 3851:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3852:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3853:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3854:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3855:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3856:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3857:     Server ! get_socket,
 3858:     ServerS = receive
 3859:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3860:               end,
 3861: 
 3862:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32]),
 3863:     {error, exporter_master_secret_already_consumed} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label3], [<<>>], [32]),
 3864:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32], false),
 3865:     {error, bad_input} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label3, Label4], [<<>>], [32]).
 3866: 
 3867: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3868: 
 3869: legacy_prf() ->
 3870:     [{doc, "Test prf/5"}].
 3871: 
 3872: legacy_prf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3873:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3874:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3875:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3876:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3877:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3878: 
 3879:    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3880:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3881:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3882:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3883:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3884: 
 3885:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3886: 
 3887:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 3888:                     [return_socket,
 3889:                      {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3890:                      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3891:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3892:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3893:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3894:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3895: 
 3896:     Server ! get_socket,
 3897:     ServerS = receive
 3898:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3899:               end,
 3900: 
 3901:     case Version of
 3902:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3903:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3904:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32);
 3905:         _ ->
 3906:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 3907:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 3908:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3909:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3910:             true = ExportKeyMaterials1 =/= ExportKeyMaterials2
 3911:     end.
 3912: 
 3913: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3914: 
 3915: establish_connection(Id, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts, Hostname) ->
 3916:     Server =
 3917:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3918:                                    {from, self()},
 3919:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 3920:                                           [Id, server_random]}},
 3921:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3922: 
 3923:     ListenPort = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3924:     Client =
 3925:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, ListenPort},
 3926:                                    {host, Hostname},
 3927:                                    {from, self()},
 3928:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 3929:                                           [Id, client_random]}},
 3930:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
 3931: 
 3932:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 3933:     {Server, Client}.
 3934: 
 3935: %%% Checker functions
 3936: get_connection_information(Socket, ConnectionId, InfoType) ->
 3937:     {ok, [ConnectionInfo]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [InfoType]),
 3938:     {ConnectionId, ConnectionInfo, secs_since_1970()}.
 3939: secs_since_1970() ->
 3940:     calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(
 3941:         calendar:universal_time()) - 62167219200.
 3942: 
 3943: connection_information_result(Socket) ->
 3944:     {ok, Info = [_ | _]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 3945:     case  length(Info) > 3 of
 3946: 	true -> 
 3947: 	    %% At least one ssl_option() is set
 3948: 	    ?CT_LOG("Info ~p", [Info]),
 3949: 	    ok;
 3950: 	false ->
 3951: 	    ct:fail(no_ssl_options_returned)
 3952:     end.
 3953: 
 3954: secret_connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 3955:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 3956:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [client_random, server_random, master_secret]),
 3957:     check_connection_info(Protocol, ConnInfo).
 3958: 
 3959: keylog_connection_info_result(Socket, KeepSecrets) ->
 3960:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 3961:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [keylog]),
 3962:     check_keylog_info(Protocol, ConnInfo, KeepSecrets).
 3963: 
 3964: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', [{keylog, ["CLIENT_HANDSHAKE_TRAFFIC_SECRET"++_,_|_]=Keylog}], true) ->
 3965:     {ok, Keylog};
 3966: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', []=Keylog, false) ->
 3967:     {ok, Keylog};
 3968: check_keylog_info(_, [{keylog, ["CLIENT_RANDOM"++_]=Keylog}], _) ->
 3969:     {ok, Keylog};
 3970: check_keylog_info(_, Unexpected, Keep) ->
 3971:     {unexpected, Keep, Unexpected}.
 3972: 
 3973: check_srp_in_connection_information(_Socket, _Username, client) ->
 3974:     ok;
 3975: check_srp_in_connection_information(Socket, Username, server) ->
 3976:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 3977:     ?CT_LOG("Info ~p~n", [Info]),
 3978:     case proplists:get_value(srp_username, Info, not_found) of
 3979:         Username ->
 3980: 	        ok;
 3981:         not_found ->
 3982:             ct:fail(srp_username_not_found)
 3983:     end.
 3984: 
 3985: %% In TLS 1.3 the master_secret field is used to store multiple secrets from the key schedule and it is a tuple.
 3986: %% client_random and server_random are not used in the TLS 1.3 key schedule.
 3987: check_connection_info('tlsv1.3', [{client_random, ClientRand},{server_random, ServerRand},
 3988:                                   {master_secret, {master_secret, MasterSecret}}]) ->
 3989:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 3990: check_connection_info(_, [{client_random, ClientRand}, {server_random, ServerRand}, {master_secret, MasterSecret}]) ->
 3991:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 3992: check_connection_info(_, _) ->
 3993:     false.
 3994: 
 3995: try_recv_active(Socket) ->
 3996:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 3997:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3998:     ok.
 3999: try_recv_active_once(Socket) ->
 4000:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4001:     ok.
 4002: 
 4003: controlling_process_result(Socket, Pid, Msg) ->
 4004:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Pid),
 4005:     %% Make sure other side has evaluated controlling_process
 4006:     %% before message is sent
 4007:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 4008:     ssl:send(Socket, Msg),
 4009:     no_result_msg.
 4010: 
 4011: controller_dies_result(_Socket, _Pid, _Msg) ->
 4012:     receive Result -> Result end.
 4013: send_recv_result_timeout_client(Socket) ->
 4014:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, not_infinity) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4015:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, -1) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4016:     try ssl:recv(Socket, not_integer, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4017:     try ssl:recv(Socket, -1, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 4018:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 4019:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 0),
 4020:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 4021:     receive
 4022: 	Msg ->
 4023: 	    io:format("Msg ~p~n",[Msg])
 4024:     after 500 ->
 4025: 	    ok
 4026:     end,
 4027:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 4028:     ok.
 4029: send_recv_result_timeout_server(Socket) ->
 4030:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello"),
 4031:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4032:     ssl:send(Socket, " world"),
 4033:     ok.
 4034: 
 4035: do_recv_close(Socket) ->
 4036:     {error, closed} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 4037:     receive
 4038: 	{_,{error,closed}} ->
 4039: 	    error_extra_close_sent_to_user_process
 4040:     after 500 ->
 4041: 	    ok
 4042:     end.
 4043: 
 4044: tls_close(Socket) ->
 4045:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send_recv_result(Socket),
 4046:     %% So both sides will have time to send
 4047:     %% and recv before close is called, as this
 4048:     %% function will be called by both client
 4049:     %% and server in the test.
 4050:     ct:sleep(100),
 4051:     case ssl:close(Socket, 10000) of
 4052:         ok ->
 4053:             ok;
 4054:         {error, closed} ->
 4055:             ok;
 4056:         Other ->
 4057:             ct:fail(Other)
 4058:     end.
 4059: 
 4060: run_error_server_close([Pid | Opts]) ->
 4061:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 4062:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 4063:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 4064:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 4065:     Pid ! ssl:close(Socket).
 4066: 
 4067: run_error_server([ Pid | Opts]) ->
 4068:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 4069:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 4070:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 4071:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 4072:     Pid ! ssl:controlling_process(Socket, self()).
 4073: 
 4074: run_client_error([Port, Opts]) ->
 4075:     ssl:connect("localhost", Port, Opts).
 4076: 
 4077: no_recv_no_active(Socket) ->
 4078:     receive
 4079:         {ssl_closed, Socket} ->
 4080:             ct:fail(received_active_msg)
 4081:     after 5000 ->
 4082:             ok
 4083:     end.
 4084: 
 4085: connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 4086:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol, selected_cipher_suite]),
 4087:     {ok, {proplists:get_value(protocol, Info), proplists:get_value(selected_cipher_suite, Info)}}.
 4088: 
 4089: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4090: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 4091: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 4092: 
 4093: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1') ->
 4094:     dtls;
 4095: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1.2') ->
 4096:     dtls;
 4097: tls_or_dtls(_) ->
 4098:     tls.
 4099: 
 4100: active_n_common(S, N) ->
 4101:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-N}]),
 4102:     receive
 4103:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4104:     after
 4105:         1000 ->
 4106:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4107:     end,
 4108:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4109:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,0}]),
 4110:     receive
 4111:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4112:     after
 4113:         1000 ->
 4114:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4115:     end,
 4116:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32767}]),
 4117:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,1}]),
 4118:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32769}]),
 4119:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32768}]),
 4120:     receive
 4121:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 4122:     after
 4123:         1000 ->
 4124:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 4125:     end,
 4126:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4127:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 4128:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,true}]),
 4129:     [{active,true}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4130:     receive
 4131:         _ -> error({error,active_n})
 4132:     after
 4133:         0 ->
 4134:             ok
 4135:     end,
 4136:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 4137:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,once}]),
 4138:     [{active,once}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4139:     receive
 4140:         _ -> error({error,active_n})
 4141:     after
 4142:         0 ->
 4143:             ok
 4144:     end,
 4145:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32768}]),
 4146:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,false}]),
 4147:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 4148:     ok.
 4149: 
 4150: ok({ok,V}) -> V.
 4151: 
 4152: repeat(N, Fun) ->
 4153:     Repeat = fun F(Arg) when is_integer(Arg), Arg > 0 -> Fun(N - Arg), F(Arg - 1);
 4154:                         F(_) -> ok end,
 4155:     Repeat(N).
 4156: 
 4157: 
 4158: get_close(Pid, Where) ->
 4159:     receive
 4160: 	{'EXIT', Pid, _Reason} ->
 4161: 	    receive
 4162: 		{_, {ssl_closed, Socket}} ->
 4163: 		    ?CT_LOG("Socket closed ~p~n",[Socket]);
 4164: 		Unexpected ->
 4165: 		    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 4166: 		    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 4167: 	    after 5000 ->
 4168: 		    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 4169: 	    end;
 4170: 	Unexpected ->
 4171: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 4172: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 4173:     after 5000 ->
 4174: 	    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 4175:     end.
 4176: 
 4177: ssl_active_recv(N) ->
 4178:     ssl_active_recv(N, []).
 4179: 
 4180: ssl_active_recv(0, Acc) ->
 4181:     Acc;
 4182: ssl_active_recv(N, Acc) ->
 4183:     receive 
 4184: 	{ssl, _, Bytes} ->
 4185:             ssl_active_recv(N-length(Bytes),  Acc ++ Bytes)
 4186:     end.
 4187: 
 4188: 
 4189: 
 4190: honor_cipher_order(Config, Honor, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, Expected) ->
 4191:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4192:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4193: 
 4194:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4195: 
 4196:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4197: 					{from, self()},
 4198: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4199: 					{options, [{ciphers, ServerCiphers}, {honor_cipher_order, Honor}
 4200: 						   | ServerOpts]}]),
 4201:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4202:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4203: 					{host, Hostname},
 4204: 					{from, self()},
 4205: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4206: 					{options, [{ciphers, ClientCiphers}
 4207: 						   | ClientOpts]}]),
 4208: 
 4209:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 4210: 
 4211:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Expected}},
 4212: 
 4213:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 4214: 
 4215:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4216:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4217: 
 4218: cookie_extension(Config, Cookie) ->
 4219:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4220:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4221:     Data = "123456789012345",  %% 15 bytes
 4222: 
 4223:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4224: 
 4225:     %% Trigger a HelloRetryRequest
 4226:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4227: 					{from, self()},
 4228: 					{options, [{supported_groups, [x448,
 4229:                                                                        secp256r1,
 4230:                                                                        secp384r1]},
 4231:                                                    {cookie, Cookie}|ServerOpts]}]),
 4232:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4233:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4234: 					{host, Hostname},
 4235: 					{from, self()},
 4236: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 4237: 
 4238:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send(Client, Data),
 4239:     Data = ssl_test_lib:check_active_receive(Server, Data),
 4240: 
 4241:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4242:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4243: 
 4244: start_client_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4245:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4246:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4247:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 4248:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4249: 					{host, Hostname},
 4250: 					{from, self()},
 4251:                                         {return_error, econnrefused},
 4252: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4253: 					{options, Options ++ ClientOpts}]),
 4254:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Client, {connect_failed, Error}]),
 4255:     {connect_failed, Error} = Client.
 4256: 
 4257: start_server_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4258:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4259:     {_, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4260:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4261: 					{from, self()},
 4262: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4263: 					{options,  Options ++ ServerOpts}]),
 4264: 
 4265:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Server,Error]),
 4266:     Error = Server.
 4267: 
 4268: der_input_opts(Opts) ->
 4269:     Certfile = proplists:get_value(certfile, Opts),
 4270:     CaCertsfile = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, Opts),
 4271:     Keyfile = proplists:get_value(keyfile, Opts),
 4272:     Dhfile = proplists:get_value(dhfile, Opts),
 4273:     [{_, Cert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Certfile),
 4274:     [{Asn1Type, Key, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Keyfile),
 4275:     [{_, DHParams, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Dhfile),
 4276:     CaCerts =
 4277: 	lists:map(fun(Entry) ->
 4278: 			  {_, CaCert, _} = Entry,
 4279: 			  CaCert
 4280: 		  end, ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CaCertsfile)),
 4281:     {Cert, {Asn1Type, Key}, CaCerts, DHParams}.
 4282: 
 4283: ssl_getstat(Socket) ->
 4284:     ssl:send(Socket, "From Erlang to Erlang"),
 4285:     {ok, Stats} = ssl:getstat(Socket),
 4286:     List = lists:dropwhile(fun({_, 0}) ->
 4287:                                    true;
 4288:                               ({_, _}) ->
 4289:                                    false
 4290:                            end, Stats),
 4291:     case List of
 4292:         [] ->
 4293:             nok;
 4294:         _  ->
 4295:             ok
 4296:     end.
 4297: 
 4298: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.3') ->
 4299:     {'tlsv1.2', ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']};
 4300: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.2') ->
 4301:     {'tlsv1.1', ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}.
 4302: 
 4303: protocol_version_check(Socket, Version) ->
 4304:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]) of
 4305:         {ok, [{protocol, Version}]} ->
 4306:             ok;
 4307:         Other ->
 4308:             ct:fail({expected, Version, got, Other})
 4309:     end.
 4310: 
 4311: log(#{msg:={report,_Report}},#{config:=Pid}) ->
 4312:     Pid ! warning_generated;
 4313: log(_,_) ->
 4314:     ok.
 4315: 
 4316: length_exclusive(Version) when Version == 'tlsv1.3';
 4317:                                Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4318:                                Version == 'tlsv1.1';
 4319:                                Version == 'tlsv1' ->
 4320:     length(exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4321:         length(exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version));
 4322: length_exclusive(Version) when Version == 'dtlsv1.2';
 4323:                                Version == 'dtlsv1' ->
 4324:     length(dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4325:         length(dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version)).
 4326: 
 4327: length_all(Version) ->
 4328:     length(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version)).
 4329: 
 4330: exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4331:     lists:flatmap(fun (Vsn) ->
 4332: 
 4333:                           ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn)
 4334:                   end,
 4335:                   up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4336: 
 4337: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1.3') -> ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1'];
 4338: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1.2') -> ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1'];
 4339: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1.1') -> ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1'];
 4340: up_to_version_helper('tlsv1') -> ['tlsv1'].
 4341: 
 4342: 
 4343: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4344:     lists:flatmap(fun (Vsn) ->
 4345:                           ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn)
 4346:                   end,
 4347:                   dtls_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4348: 
 4349: dtls_up_to_version_helper('dtlsv1.2') -> ['dtlsv1.2', 'dtlsv1'];
 4350: dtls_up_to_version_helper('dtlsv1') -> ['dtlsv1'].
 4351: 
 4352: 
 4353: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4354:     lists:flatmap(fun exclusive_non_default_version/1,
 4355:                   up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4356: 
 4357: 
 4358: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4359:     lists:flatmap(fun dtls_exclusive_non_default_version/1,
 4360:                   dtls_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4361: 
 4362: exclusive_non_default_version(Version) ->
 4363:     Ls = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4364:          , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4365:          , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4366:          , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1
 4367:          , fun tls_v1:rc4_exclusive/1],
 4368:     lists:flatmap(fun(Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Ls).
 4369: 
 4370: dtls_exclusive_non_default_version(DTLSVersion) ->        
 4371:     Version = ssl:tls_version(dtls_record:protocol_version_name(DTLSVersion)),
 4372:     Fns = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4373:           , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4374:           , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4375:           , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1],
 4376:     lists:flatmap(fun (Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Fns).
 4377: 
 4378: selected_peer(ExpectedClient,
 4379:               ExpectedServer, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
 4380:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4381: 
 4382:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4383: 					{from, self()},
 4384:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedServer]}},
 4385:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ServerOpts, Config)}]),
 4386:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4387: 
 4388:     Client  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4389:                                          {host, Hostname},
 4390:                                          {from, self()},
 4391:                                          {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedClient]}},
 4392:                                          {options,  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ClientOpts, Config)}
 4393: 					]),
 4394: 
 4395:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 4396:     %% Make sure to start next test fresh
 4397:     ssl:stop(),
 4398:     ssl:start().
 4399: 
 4400: test_config('tlsv1.3', _) ->
 4401:     #{server_config := SEDDSAOpts,
 4402:       client_config := CEDDSAOpts} = eddsa_cert_chains(),
 4403:     #{server_config := SECDSAOpts,
 4404:       client_config := CECDSAOpts } = ecdsa_cert_chains(),
 4405: 
 4406:     {SEDDSACert, SEDDSAKey, SEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SEDDSAOpts),
 4407:     {CEDDSACert, CEDDSAKey, CEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CEDDSAOpts),
 4408: 
 4409:     {SECDSACert, SECDSAKey, SECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SECDSAOpts),
 4410:     {CECDSACert, CECDSAKey, CECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CECDSAOpts),
 4411: 
 4412:     ServerCertKeys = [#{cert => SECDSACert, key => SECDSAKey},
 4413:                       #{cert => SEDDSACert, key => SEDDSAKey}],
 4414: 
 4415:     ClientCertKeys = [#{cert => CECDSACert, key => CECDSAKey},
 4416:                       #{cert => CEDDSACert, key => CEDDSAKey}],
 4417: 
 4418:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys,ServerCertKeys},
 4419:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4420:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4421:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4422:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4423:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]
 4424:        },
 4425:       {client_peer, SEDDSACert}, {server_peer, CEDDSACert}},
 4426:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, ServerCertKeys},
 4427:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4428:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4429:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4430:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4431:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]},
 4432:       {client_peer, SECDSACert}, {server_peer, CECDSACert}}
 4433:     ];

 4460:        },

 4513: 
 4514:     RSAConf2 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config),
 4515:     SRSA2Opts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4516:     CRSA2Opts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4517:

 4519:     {CRSA1Cert, CRSA1Key, _CRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA1Opts),
 4520: 
 4521:     {SRSA2Cert, SRSA2Key, SRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA2Opts),
 4522:     {CRSA2Cert, CRSA2Key, CRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA2Opts),
 4523:

 4526:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4527:                           {cacertfile, SRSA2CACerts}],
 4528:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSA2Cert, keyfile  => CRSA2Key},
 4529:                                         #{certfile => CRSA1Cert, keyfile => CRSA1Key}]},
 4530:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4531:                           {cacertfile, CRSA2CACerts}]
 4532:        }, {client_peer,  pem_to_der_cert(SRSA2Cert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSA2Cert)}}].
 4533: 
 4534: check_peercert(Socket, Cert) ->
 4535:     case ssl:peercert(Socket) of
 4536:         {ok, Cert} ->
 4537:             ok;
 4538:         {ok, Other} ->
 4539:             {error, {{expected, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp)}, {got, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Other, otp)}}}
 4540:     end.
 4541: 
 4542: 
 4543: eddsa_cert_chains() ->
 4544:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4545:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4546:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
 4547:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4548:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4549:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}).
 4550: 
 4551: ecdsa_cert_chains() ->
 4552:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4553:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4554:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()},
 4555:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4556:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4557:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()}}).
 4558: dsa_cert_chains() ->
 4559:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}],
 4560:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4561:                                                   peer =>  [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}]
 4562:                                                  },
 4563:                                 client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}],
 4564:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4565:                                                   peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}]}}).
 4566: 
 4567: get_single_options(CertOptName, KeyOptName, CaOptName, Opts) ->
 4568:     CertOpt = proplists:get_value(CertOptName, Opts),
 4569:     KeyOpt = proplists:get_value(KeyOptName, Opts),
 4570:     CaOpt = proplists:get_value(CaOptName, Opts),
 4571:     {CertOpt, KeyOpt, CaOpt}.
 4572: 
 4573: pem_to_der_cert(Pem) ->
 4574:     [{'Certificate', Der, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Pem),
 4575:     Der.
 4576: 
 4577: test_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3'= Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) ->
 4578:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, ecdsa_sha1),
 4579:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, rsa_pkcs1_sha1);
 4580: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4581:                                                       Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4582:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, {sha, rsa}),
 4583:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, {sha, ecdsa});
 4584: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version,RSA,_,Config) ->
 4585:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, undefined).
 4586: 
 4587: run_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3', #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4588:     SigAlgs = [%% ECDSA
 4589:                ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 4590:                ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 4591:                ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 4592:                %% RSASSA-PSS
 4593:                rsa_pss_pss_sha512,
 4594:                rsa_pss_pss_sha384,
 4595:                rsa_pss_pss_sha256,
 4596:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,
 4597:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,
 4598:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
 4599:                %% EDDSA
 4600:                eddsa_ed25519,
 4601:                eddsa_ed448
 4602:               ],
 4603:     IncludeLegacyAlg =  SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4604:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  SigAlgs} | ClientOpts],
 4605:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config, handshake_failure),
 4606:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4607:                                     [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4608: 
 4609: run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4610:                                                                                                                  Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4611:     SigAlgs =  [%% SHA2
 4612:                 {sha512, ecdsa},
 4613:                 {sha512, rsa},
 4614:                 {sha384, ecdsa},
 4615:                 {sha384, rsa},
 4616:                 {sha256, ecdsa},
 4617:                 {sha256, rsa},
 4618:                 {sha224, ecdsa},
 4619:                 {sha224, rsa}],
 4620:     IncludeLegacyAlg = SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4621:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test( [{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4622:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4623: run_sha1_cert_conf(_, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4624:     NVersion = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 4625:     SigOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(LegacyAlg, NVersion),
 4626:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts] ++ SigOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 4627: 
 4628: 
 4629: rsa_cipher_suites_not_default('tlsv1.3'= Version) ->
 4630:     [_ | Suites] = ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version),
 4631:     Suites;
 4632: rsa_cipher_suites_not_default(Version) ->
 4633:     ssl_test_lib:test_ciphers(ecdhe_rsa, aes_128_gcm, Version).
 4634: 
 4635: suite_check(Socket, 'tlsv1.3'= Version) ->
 4636:     [_, Suite| _] = ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version),
 4637:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [selected_cipher_suite]) of
 4638:         {ok, [{selected_cipher_suite, Suite}]} ->
 4639:             ok;
 4640:         Other ->
 4641:             ct:fail({expected, Suite, got, Other})
 4642:     end;
 4643: suite_check(Socket, Version) ->
 4644:     [Suite |_] = rsa_cipher_suites_not_default(Version),
 4645:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [selected_cipher_suite]) of
 4646:         {ok, [{selected_cipher_suite, Suite}]} ->
 4647:             ok;
 4648:         Other ->
 4649:             ct:fail({expected, Suite, got, Other})
 4650:     end.
